story:
The Essay Contest is now accepting entries!


Update: We're pleased to announce two celebrity judges! WFAN Radio personality Craig Carton and former New York Mets pitcher John Franco will help pick the winning essays from among those submitted. 

Why Sportsmanship?

Sportsmanship — and sportsmanlike qualities such as self-control, fair play, and respect for opponents, rules and authority — are recognized as being so important that virtually all organized sports include penalties for unsportsmanlike conduct. And yet, athletes and fans behaving badly seem to get all the publicity. We aim to change that among the young athletes in New York City.

Why a Sportsmanship Essay Contest?

New York Sports Connection, the hub for information about youth sports programs in New York City, aims to encourage sportsmanship and fair play among young people by sponsoring an essay contest for City residents ages 12-18. We want young people to recognize the importance of sportsmanship on the playing field and off, and encourage them to have conversations about being a good sport with their families, coaches and teammates.

Recognizing Winning Essays

Winning entries will receive online recognition on our Facebook page and on NewYorkSportsConnection.com, in press releases, and will receive cash and/or other prizes. We will also publish the finalists and winning essays in an ebook—and, if we hit our stretch goal—we will publish a hard copy version of the collected essays. Because we want to make the contest accessible to as many young people as possible, there will be no fee to enter.

We are asking for funds for prize money, to purchase prizes such as tickets to professional sports games, sports-related gift cards, etc., and to promote the contest.

Moving Examples of Sportsmanship

Examples of true sportsmanship are often so moving that they're remembered long after the game (or the season) ends.

Elementary school student Hugo Leuchars was playing for the New York Fusions Kings U10 soccer team, and they were behind, 4-3, in a 2013 game. With about five minutes left, Hugo found himself on a one-on-one breakaway. He unloaded a hard shot at the goalkeeper, who blocked the kick with his stomach and immediately fell to the ground in obvious pain. Though Hugo could have taken the easy shot at an empty goal, tying the game, Hugo chose instead to check on the injured goalkeeper as defenders kicked the ball out of bounds.

In June, 2012, high school junior Meghan Vogel was running last in the 3200-meter state finals when the runner ahead of her collapsed. Instead of racing past Arden McMath and avoiding a career-first—a last place finish—Vogel stopped and picked up her exhausted competitor. Vogel carried McMath the final 20 meters to the finish line, making sure that McMath finished ahead of herself.

In November, 2011, High school rowers James Konopka and Nick Mead were likely to finish in the medals when one of their opponents' boats capsized in the river's 45-degree water. Abandoning the race, the pair turned into rescuers, waiting with the capsized rowers until a launch arrived. They resumed the race, finishing in last place.

In 2009, high school senior Johntel Franklin showed up to his high school basketball game in the second quarter. He had lost his mother to cancer earlier in the day. Because his name wasn't listed in the scorebook, Franklin was assessed a technical foul. Knowing the situation, the opposing coach was forced—against his wishes—to send in one of his players to take the free throws. Darius McNeal went to the line...and missed both shots on purpose.

As a clearinghouse of information about youth sports programs in NYC, New York Sports Connection hopes our essay contest will celebrate and inspire similar similar examples of sportsmanship among the young athletes (and parents) we serve.

Stretch Goal

We plan to create a collection of the finalist and winning essays in the form of an eBook. If we hit our stretch goal of $5,000, we will publish a hard copy version of the book, and every finalist and winner will receive a copy. We will also make them available as a Perk at the $25 level, and bundle them free with every Perk at the $100 level and above. 

More Ways You Can Help

  • Share the Contest Entry Page with NYC students ages 12-18: http://www.newyorksportsconnection.com/2015-essay-contest
  • Use the social sharing buttons on this page to share our campaign with your friends.
  • Please like the New York Sports Connection Essay Contest page on Facebook and share it with parents in New York City.
  • Donate gift cards, authentic New York sports memorabilia, or new sports equipment for us to use as Perks or essay contest prizes (contact us with details.)
  • Are you a professional athlete in New York City and a good sport? Please share the New York Sports Connection Essay Contest Facebook page with your social network. Consider donating a signed item for use as a Perk or an essay contest prize.
  • If you're the parent of a young athlete, model appropriate sportsmanlike behavior, and praise your child for showing respect and playing fair, not just for winning.
Help New York Sports Connection Support and Encourage Sportsmanship

New York City is the best sports town in the world. With the help of New York City’s parents, coaches, and City residents, renowned professional athletes (current and former), and professional and amateur sports teams, we can make this essay contest a success. Thank you for your support.

story:
Everyone who contributes will receive a PDF copy of our books :)

About The Book

PLEASE CLICK HERE TO READ THE FIRST CHAPTER
"Witches revenge" is the sequel to "Bloodline".

Spellbound Chronicles tells the story of Larna and Aron who, while geocaching in the ancient Sherwood Forest, find themselves reluctantly pulled through time into a Sherwood of the future. Faced with the task of fighting to save an enslaved and fast-mutating race from extinction, they set out with the formidable wizard, Balgaire, and his friends to take on the might of the fearsome warlock, Mordrog.

A battle for wands, destruction and kidnapping ensues, with a hint of romance thrown in, in the form of underground shape shifter Cai. As the final epic battle takes place, will Larna and Aron survive the fight long enough to return unscathed to their own time and their own Sherwood..?

Our story


Hi my name is Eve Maguire. I am the mother of Suzanne Maguire. Suzanne has been living with MND/ALS for the last 13 years. When she was diagnosed the doctors gave her less than 4 years to live. Because of her writing and he determination to leave a legacy for her two boys, Lance and Aron, she has stayed strong and is still with us. 

Her recent visit to the hospital wasn't the best, so time isn't on our side. I want to do everything I can to make her dream, of the Spellbound Chronicles Trilogy being a success and leaving a legacy for her family, happen.

We have spent the last 12 years developing ideas, writing and getting our first book "The Spellbound Chronicles: Bloodline" self published but we have hit a brick wall. I remortgaged my house to get the money together to get her ideas in print and now everyone has had their share, there is no more to get the second book published and marketed.

This is where you wonderful patrons can help.

This campaign is for your assistance in getting the second book "Witches Revenge" to print.

This is our first campaign and hopefully it won't be our last.

 

 

What We Need 

We need only £9000 to get 1500 copies of "Witches Revenge" printed, pay our amazing editor, Gordon Volke - and our extremely talented illustrator, Peter Jarvis - to complete the artwork for the book and the new web comic.

Here is our breakdown of the costs.

Print and Delivery: £2495.00

Editor: £2400.00

Illustration: £1250.00.

Marketing / Promotion: £2855.00 

If, for any reason, we don't reach our target, we will work tirelessly to sell the merchandise we print to raise the remainder of the capital needed. Peter will also create beautiful pieces of original artwork to sell or auction to raise the remainder,

Whatever the case, we will make sure we reach our goal to make book two a success.

What You Get

Everyone who helps us will receive a PDF copy of the first book and the second book (once completed), no matter how much you pledge. We want to give something back to say a huge thank you.

Patrons who pledge more will receive even more amazing perks including; signed copies of the books, T-shirts, limited edition signed illustration prints and much more.

A PDF version of our current book Spellbound Chronicles "Bloodline" and "Witches Revenge" in PDF format and a huge thank you for supporting our new book project.

• A signed copy of our current book - Spellbound Chronicles "Bloodline"

• A PDF copy of our new book once it has been completed.

• Plus a huge thank you for supporting our new book project.

• A signed copy of our current book - Spellbound Chronicles "Bloodline"

• A Signed copy of our new book once it has been printed.

• Plus a huge thank you for supporting our new book project.

• A signed copy of our current book - Spellbound Chronicles "Bloodline"

• A Signed copy of our new book once it has been printed.

• Your name mentioned in the front of the new book.

• A huge thank you for supporting our new book project.


• A signed copy of our current book - Spellbound Chronicles "Bloodline"

• A Signed copy of our new book once it has been printed.

• Your name mentioned in the front of the new book.

• A signed limited edition print of each front cover of the book. Signed by the authors and the illustrator.

• A huge thank you for supporting our new book project.

• A signed copy of the very first edition of the book "The Gorry Brothers".

• A signed copy of our current book - Spellbound Chronicles "Bloodline"

• A Signed copy of our new book once it has been printed.

• A personlised copy of the new book with all the characters names changed to people you know.

• A signed limited edition print of each front cover of the books.

• Limited edition postcard prints of all the illustrations used in the book signed by the illustrator and authors.

• A huge thank you for supporting our new book project.

• A signed copy of the very first edition of the book "The Gorry Brothers".

• A signed copy of our current book - Spellbound Chronicles "Bloodline"

• A signed copy of our book three - (To be written)

• A Signed copy of our new book once it has been printed.

• A personlised version of the new book with all the characters names changed to people you know.

• A signed limited edition print of each front cover of the book.

• Limited edition postcard prints of all the illustrations used in the book signed by the illustrator and authors.

• The illustrators copy of all the books with his original sketches, notes and comments. There's one only.

• A thank you and a mention in the new book

• A huge thank you for supporting our new book project.

To say a huge thank you for your exceptional generosity, you will receive copies of all the books, all the limited edition prints, a huge huge thank you. plus .....

A day in Sherwood Forest with Eve, Suzanne and Pete. A walk around the Forest and a lovely meal to chat with us about our journey.

If you are in the UK, we arrange transport, but if you are outside the UK, you will have to make your way to meet us.

If, for any reason, you cannot make it to Sherwood Forest, we can arrange a Skype call with you and your family to chat about the books, our journey and story in person.

We will also arrange for Peter to create a piece of original artwork from the book, signed by us all.

We look forward to seeing you.

The Impact

If we all manage to get these books published for Suzanne and her boys, it will make everything we have been through over the last 12 years worth it. There have been some very emotional times and some absolutely aw-inspiring times. But for Suzanne to be able to leave the legacy of the Spellbound Chronicles to the boys would be the best gift ever.

We would love for you to help us with this. We want you to become a part of the happier times we have had.

Risks & Challenges

We have had some struggle over the years with printers upping their prices, our first illustrator not giving us what you wanted and PR companies promising the world, but we have learned so much.

The most important lesson we have learned is; where to invest our available capital and that's with the people who are in this with us. 

Along our journey we have met some, not-so-helpful people, some very greedy people and some extremely wonderful/helpful ones. We have kept the wonderful/helpful ones close and, like us, they are in this to make it a success for Suzanne.

The risks and challenges we perceive are;

1. Suzanne not quite making it to complete book three before the end of the year. We will over come this by working together, as we always do, to get all the ideas and stories she has written down.

2. A small increase in paper costs from now till the book is published. We promise, this will not impact on you getting your book or your merchandise. We have factored in a potential 3-6% increase.

3. Although I have set a date for shipping to be in June 2015, I really cannot guarantee that. Since the novel still needs some editing to be perfect, we cannot guarantee an absolute definitive release date.  It may take more editing and rewrites than we think to polish, and finish, the second book in the trilogy.  We will keep everyone updated on the progress of the editing, and further updates on when we will have the book in our hands.

We have already encountered cost increases on all areas of our Self-publishing journey and have gained the knowledge to manage everything ourselves. That way we keep the cost of the books low and accessible to all.

We welcome and questions you may have. Please feel free to contact us. info@spellboundchronicles.co.uk

Shipping

All perks include shipping within the UK via Royal Mail.  International orders will ship Royal Mail International post please add the extra amount required to cover the additional cost of shipping outside the UK.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to donate (you don't necessarily want anything in return) you can do so at the top of the page where the bright pink button says "Contribute Now".  All you'll get is our heartfelt thanks in return!

I understand that some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help!  You can spread the word about this campaign to anyone you think might be interested in our book!

Thank you so much. x

story:
What is digital business?

Hello,  I'm a student at Hyper Island's digital business program and now I want share my thoughts about what the hell digital business really is.

Therefore;

  •  I want to create a creative guide to digital business for everyone that is in or going into the digital world
  • It will be a collaborative journey and co-written with some of the best in the business
  • Be a go-to-toolbox for developing your's and your teams digital abilities

What I Need & What You Get

I need 6000 USD in order to not take another boring summer job and feel miserable.  So I need money to stay afloat, travel to the experts around the world, order some expensive coffees at any Hipster bar and hire a fancy illustrator.

What is Digital business is our whole education into one solid and good locking book. 

The books structure

  1. How did we end up digital?
  2. Top digital paradigms today and tomorrow
  3. Disruption through the ages (Ubers of the stone age and forward)
  4. Success stories and why they made it (Uber, Airbnb,  Netflix, Google, Facebook e.t.c)
  5. Epic fail stories and why they are gone (Kodak, Nokia, Blockbuster e.t.c.)
  6. The millennials! Who are they and what do they want?
  7. The startup Era (Silicon valley, VCs, Incubators, economic perspective & maker community e.t.c)
  8. How to work in the digital age (Automation, group dynamics, reflection & expectation management)
  9. How to manage remote work (freelance, skype meetings and frea*** holograms
  10. User experience (Design thinking, Agile, Lean UX, User research, UI & usability testing)
  11. Branding, marketing & communication
  12. Driven by Data (Big data, hypothesis, Google analytics, data driven e.t.c.)
  13. Commerce in the digital age  (MVP to success, AAARR-model e.t.c.)
  14. Leading projects and people in the digital age
  15. Culture creation & change management
  16. Interviews of great peoples view on Digital business
  17. Interviews from people that F**** up in the digital age

The Impact
This is the book to jumpstart or develop any digital career.  I think it will be the perfect mix of theory and experience. Once read - the world will not be the same.

Risks & Challenges

I'm have under the last year written around 50 blog post for different outlets and now I want to use my newly develop skills into something of mine. 

I use to indegogo because I need the money in order to not having a boring ass summer job.

story:
A King without a castle,
A Queen without a throne,
A human, dehumanized
A homeless all alone.

"Beyond The Highways!"

 

If you have spent any time with homeless people, then you are likely aware of the struggles that they face each and every day. Life on the streets can be tough, going without food and water, spending nights in the cold, living your life in open spaces (without any privacy). It can weigh in heavy on anyone, and unfortunately the solution to this problem (homelessness) is not very clear.

From a very young age, I realized that there was stark contrast between people; the difference in their characteristics, the elements that elevate or decline their social, economic, artistic or intellectual status and issues and behaviors that were in-tune to my inner dislike.  Therefore, I tried to sympathize with the homeless and close the gap in order to understand them.  For example, on my way to school, I would dirty up my new shoes, just to blend in and show that I am not very different from them.

Throughout the 2009 post-election "Green movement" demonstrations and social disturbances in Iran, I was an activist and journalist.  My biggest fear was to be arrested by the authorities.  Afraid to be followed, I spent numerous nights away from my home.  Some of those nights, I spent in public spaces such as parks, bus and rail stations in my hometown, Tehran.

I heard about “Occupy DC” after I arrived in the US in 2011. I started filming and taking pictures of the movement in DC, where I met a lot of homeless people. Observing, listening and talking to the homeless started to transform me much more than I, or anyone else for that matter, anticipated. It was as if taking pictures of the homeless people, opened up the gates to a whole new world for me. A world, previously unknown to me.

 
"Occupy DC"

With my earlier experiences in photography both in Iran and later in the United States, focusing mainly on social issues, I developed a new interest in portrait and fashion photography. I setup my first home photo studio in my modest apartment. One documentary and a few modelling photography projects are among the outcomes of those days.


Moving to the US, imprinted a well-known phrase in my grey cells “Us and Them.”  People are regularly judged and segregated based on the color of their skin, appearances, accent and even color of their hair. The phrase coins a whole new meaning when average Joes are compared to the homeless people living in front of Washington DC’s train station and even more so when New York’s fifth avenue, beautiful slim models dressed in pricey clothes are compared to the homeless who live only a few blocks away.

The sharp contrast ignited the initial temptation for me to start this project. There is a homeless camp next to I95 highway called the “Blue Camp.”  It is ironically situated between Washington DC and New York City.  This is where I started the project.

“Beyond the Highways” is the name that I chose for my project.  I want to show that every homeless man is a handsome King, a caring hero, a husband, son or brother and every homeless woman is a beautiful queen, a gorgeous model, a wife, a sister, a daughter and a creator of mankind.  

So, I talked to the homeless and told them that I want them to model for me.  I want to see, if for a moment we can trade places of the homeless people with models.

In the first part of the project, each person tells the story of his/her past and present and his/her plans for the future. They sit in front of the camera with a black, gray and white (which resembles hope) background.

In the second part of the project, each person is asked to think of him/herself as a model and to strike poses in front of the camera and to act in whatever style they choose to.

 

My plan is to publish a book that includes the photos of people whose homelessness has been the result of circumstances outside of their control.


In addition to the book, we are developing a mobile-phone app to go along with the book.  The reader can scan the code next to each interviewee in the book and a 3-5 minute long video of that person would be shown on the app.

In addition, readers and contributor comments would be available on the app for each interviewee. 

 

To top it off, I also include a documentary on how “Beyond the Highway” was made.


 

What I Need & What You Get

So far, I have spent all of my savings on this project.  Yet the total cost for the project is $28,250.00.  That is why I turned to Indiegogo to reach you and raise the needed funds that would be spent on the following:

  • Purchase of a Canon 5D IV camera and related lens
  • Publication and Print costs for the book
  • Homeless people transportation to the studio
  • Introduction and submission costs for introducing the book to major international festivals
  • Film editing, sound design, sound mixing and video post-production costs

 

The Expected Impact

It is next to impossible to state what potential impact would this project have on the lives of these less fortunate people living amongst us.

Just as I dirtied my shoes when I was a kid, I want to use this project to obscure the socioeconomic lines that divide us. I want to humanize these homeless people, who are so often dehumanized by our society, and show the world a path forward.

My main goal in this project is to reveal the beauty that might not be seen because of our insensitivity. I would like to highlight that the black color could be an outcome of unwanted circumstances; grey could represent the hard conditions, while white symbolizes hopefulness of life. The project tends to show that all people deserve respect and they are all born equal with dignity and rights.

I would like to emphasize throughout the book and the documentary my respect for all human beings, to criticize the conventional approach of people to these two groups of the society, and to ask people to rethink of their prejudgments of any specific group or individuals. Listening to various stories of the interviewees warns us that same story could happen to anyone, that each one of us could come across such experiences in life due to the circumstances that are beyond one’s will and control.

The book takes us to a journey into the past and present life and the future dreams of a homeless. In the photos where s/he imagines her/himself as a model, bright and strong sparks of hope are visible.

Risks & Challenges

It has been tough to find people who are willing to participate in this project, as homeless people usually avoid appearing in the media. As such, we have worked with people not only in DC area but in other cities as well. Another challenge that we faced was finding a place to conduct our interviews and to produce the documentary in. A Woodbridge church and a RCC office have both been integral in this regard.

 

We want this project to be unique. We also want the project to have an emotional impact on people, a very similar impact that I received while working on the project.

 

P.S. This story is deeply personal to me, as I myself have been homeless twice, even for short time, once in 2009 and another time in 2016. I have tasted the desperation of homelessness and felt what it is like to be discarded by society. As such, I empathize with these people in a very real way, and I strive to ensure that my empathy shines through in every part of this project. I want people to understand the experience of homelessness.

 

Here are the Perks!

 

 

Thanks so much for reading!

story:
Hello & Welcome SoulBotox

I know I am talking about every single one of you, at some point of your journey - when I say I found myself in a dark place and I was crying out loud for that “something” to bring me back to life! Turned out SoulBotox to be that "something" for me, a project that brought me back to life and purpose after a really painful period of burnout followed by anxiety and isolation.

Thankfully, I have found my light at the end of the tunnel and now I am on a mission to help, support and empower young adults going through the “city rollercoaster”!

SoulBotox Power Tools: Guidance - Support - Life Coaching - Inspiration - Motivation 

Being blessed with the opportunity of travelling and living in a number of cosmopolitan empires, I had a well paid job & a great place to call home -experiencing great privileges of modern living. BUT something really meaningful was missing. This invaluable feeling of belonging - a paramount element to happiness! Originally from a tiny country in Eastern Europe, I am proud of the culture I was born and raised in. Rich in greatly rooted values whereas treating people with warmth, respect and consideration is pretty much the norm! I was slapped, quite painfully, by the cold, megapolis' vibes. To my surprise, it was incredibly difficult to transcend these values, I was so attached to,  into creating my squad in the city, a group of friends I can lean in when times get rough but also celebrate little wonders of life (the reality of a big city kicked in, BIG TIME).

 It was lonely, very lonely. 

Seems like you live in a huge city with so many people and opportunities but you still feel lonely - what a paradox!

To demystify this dilemma I started researching and continuously writing on topics I felt were insightful and uplifting for my spirit. Sent them over to my colleagues, friends, contacts as a daily energy booster (please bare in mind, I am not a professional writer or journalist - I simply wrote from my heart). Little that I knew that the feedback that I will get will lead me to create SoulBotox, exchanging a career in law to become a life coach and a yoga instructor, move countries, travel and meet people who inspire me to become a better me every day. 

SOULBOTOX MANIFESTO

In a world moving at the speed of light with increased digitalised experiences which result in a notable decrease of human interaction, SoulBotox aims to bring us back to basics.

A platform for those who love and care for their inner spark, good quality conversations and intellectual debates. For authentic brains with open minded spirits, thirsty for continuous self enhancement, learning and growing at their own speed. 

An alternative guide for preserving authenticity and spreading goodness with joy!

What is SoulBotox raising funds for?

 1. Platform development and maintenance - focusing on quality content management. 

 2. Creating and filming video content on overcoming Monday blues/ anxiety/ loneliness in megapolis.

 3. Recruiting AUTHENTIC thinkers, students, young adults, career shifters, work from home moms, to write about "the real thing" - challenges of modern living. 

4. SoulBotox eShop to offer a range of products relevant to self development, emotional wellbeing,  health and nutrition. 

SoulBotox is going to be full of real people, just like you & me, sharing their authentic life stories. It is a platform for those who love and care for their inner spark, good quality conversations and intellectual debates. For authentic brains with open minded spirits, thirst for continuous self enhancement, learning and growing at their own speed. 

Openness, sincerity and depth of conversation is not everyone's cup of tea, so we focus on quality and consistency which does take time to develop. Join us in creating an alternative guide for preserving authenticity and spreading goodness with bliss!

Risks & Challenges - Ooops! we got those, too...

SoulBotox is here to organically nurture a likeminded readership, passionate about writing in an authentic manner, sharing wisdom, life lessons and genuine support. 

I started SoulBotox with great passion and dedication to grow the platform organically, earn loyal readership through offering valuable content. My current challenge is raising platform's awareness and hiring a skilled team to help me run the show. To overcome this challenge, I have gone through a detailed research and have identified: 

1. A web development agency to develop and maintain the technical functionality of the platform.  

2. Freelance copywriters to support editing, thus YOU can receive quality, soulful content.

3. A tiny but awesome production company & marketing agency to facilitate video content for interviews. 

4. Qualified life coaches, nutritionists, mental health professionals that are more than happy to share their knowledge & guidance with SoulBotox Community. 

Having invested my personal savings into starting the project I now reached a stage that requires further funding to raise platform's awareness and make it available to young adults in big cities, wanting to be understood, guided and supported in ups and downs of their journeys. Emotional Wellbeing Coaching should not be a luxury thus SoulBotox is taking a step further towards authenticating life coaches' bespoke approach. We are encouraging life coaches interested in SoulBotox to write a series of articles thus validate their methodology. Providing you, as a reader, find it helpful and wish to take the conversation further, SoulBotox will be happy to facilitate an initial session for you!

We are expecting a large influx of submissions and a rigorous selection of material for editing. This challenge will be handled accordingly by sourcing content managers, editors and social media specialists to deliver fresh and qualitative material to your screens. 

Volunteers are welcomed - we are in the process of discussing content contribution from schools of journalism to offer students a writing debut (a great opportunity for them to build a portfolio and get a job in the industry). 

I am happy to answer any further questions you may wish to address, meanwhile thank you kindly for your precious time and interest.

story:
Hallo, mein Name ist Tom Amarque. Ich bin Verleger des Phänomen Verlages, Autor und auch Podcaster.

 

Ich möchte euch gerne ein Projekt vorstellen, für das ich eure Unterstützung suche. Ich werde im Oktober 2019 ein unabhängiges Online-Journal publizieren, welches aus einer 'integralen' oder auch 'post-postmodernen' Perspektive über Gegenwartsereignisse, Kultur und Politik berichtet. Mit einem Team von hochqualifizierten Autoren möchte ich neue Perspektiven und Narrative für die Welt anbieten, in und mit der wir leben.

Die Mainstream Medien leiden (Stichworte Post-truth/Fake-News/Relotius-Affäre) unter einem Legitimationsproblem. Dies hat zwei Gründe. Einerseits sind sie vielfach immer noch in einem modernen Paradigma verwurzelt (und leiden unter dem Ansturm postmoderner Relativität) und basieren auf der Annahme, eine wirkliche Welt zu beschreiben. Das macht sie anfällig für Ideologien, weil unterschiedliche Outlets um die Deutungshoheit kämpfen, wiewohl es klar ist, dass es keine eine Deutung oder Wahrheit mehr gibt, sondern nur Perspektiven. Und um eine einzelne Perspektive als gültig zu verkaufen, benötigt man eine Ideologie als Fundament.

Zum anderen sind sie aus ökonomischen Gründen gezwungen, die Leserschaft durch polarisierende Perspektiven und Klickbait an sich zu binden. Das Resultat ist sind oberflächliche Beschreibungen, die zur gesellschaftlichen Spaltung beitragen, anstatt Lösungen anzubieten. Es ist das, was der Philosoph Daniel Schmachtenberger meint, wenn er sagt, dass die meisten News Outlets Propaganda sind, die wenig Informationen und viel Lärm erzeugen. Es gibt, in seinen Worten, kaum ‚High signal - low noise‘ outlets, die nicht voreingenommen sind.

Ich trage schon seit fast zwei Jahren die Idee mit mir herum, ein Online-Magazin herauszubringen, dass diese Probleme umschifft, und das komplexe, nuancierte und vor allem integrale und entwicklungsbezogene Artikel zum Zeitgeschehen herausbringt aber mit einem anderen Finanzierungsmodell arbeitet - und daher nicht gezwungen ist, zu polarisieren. Nämlich freiwillige Finanzierung durch Crowdfunding und Schwarm-Intelligenz. Denn

In den Vereinigten Staaten sind in den letzten Jahren einige außergewöhnlich erfolgreiche Online-Magazine entstanden, die auf so einem alternativen ökonomischen Ansatz basieren und damit die Möglichkeit haben, neue Perspektiven und Kontexte anzubieten. Sie bieten nuancierte Inhalte frei an, laufen ohne Werbung, und verlassen sich auf die Schwarm-Intelligenz des Internets, dass gute Arbeit belohnt wird, und basieren damit vollkommen auf der freiwilligen Unterstützung der Leser.

Solche Magazine sind natürlich Vorbild. Im Gegensatz zu diesen Magazinen ziele ich aber auf ein Magazin ab, dass auch die langfristige soziale und psychologische Entwicklungsperspektiven mit berücksichtigt, und das heißt, integrale, komplexe und nuancierte Artikel, die eine Vielzahl von Perspektiven zu einem Thema zu umfassen und zu integrieren wissen. Dabei gilt es nicht nur, große historische Perspektiven zuwenden, sondern auch die neuesten Erkenntnisse aus Entwicklungspsychologie, Philosophie und Sozialwissenschaften.

Ich werde also im Oktober diesen Jahres ein Magazin veröffentlichen,  dass vielfältige Perspektiven zu gegebenen Themen präsentieren und damit ein umfangreiches Bild der Wirklichkeit erzeugen kann, während es gleichzeitig auf die Schwarm-Intelligenz vertraut. Ein Magazin, dass einen angemessen KONTEXT für das Zeitgeschehen ermöglicht. Jede Perspektive hat, auch wenn sie unvollständig ist, einen wahren Kern. Und nur, wenn man sie alle zusammennimmt, kann man sicherstellen, einigermaßen passend und angemessen in der Welt handeln zu können.

Durch meine langjährige Arbeit als Verleger verfüge ich über die Kapazitäten und die sozialen Kontakte, um so ein Magazin ins Leben zu rufen. Autoren und Redakteure müssen allerdings bezahlt werden (Qualitäts-Artikel sind teuer!), ebenso der Aufbau einer Website, technisches Equipment und Werbemaßnahmen. Aus diesem Grund suche ich eure Unterstützung, bis die Seite sich selbst und seine Autoren tragen kann. Ich rechne damit, dass es 1-3 Jahre dauert, bis sich die Seite stabil selbst erhalten kann. 

 Die Zeiten verändern sich. Nur, indem wir unsere Perspektiven erweitern sind wir fähig, uns in dieser sich rapide verändernden Welt angemessen zu verhalten. Wenn sie jedoch auch mit den gegenwärtigen Medien unzufrieden sind, aber ihr Weltbild erweitern wollen, dann bitte ich Sie um Ihre Unterstützung. Lassen Sie uns mit der Zeit gehen und gemeinsam neue Beschreibungen der Wirklichkeit ermöglichen, und damit unser Bild wie wir uns selbst und die Welt, in und mit der wir wohnen, beschreiben können. Denn nur wenn wir eine richtige Landkarte haben, können wir angemessen handeln.

Das macht sie anfällig für Ideologien, weil unterschiedliche Outlets um die Deutungshoheit kämpfen, wiewohl es klar ist, dass es keine eine Deutung oder Wahrheit mehr gibt, sondern nur Perspektiven. Und um eine einzelne Perspektive als gültig zu verkaufen, benötigt man eine Ideologie als Fundament.
Zum anderen sind sie aus ökonomischen Gründen gezwungen, die Leserschaft durch polarisierende Perspektiven und Klickbait an sich zu binden. Das Resultat ist sind oberflächliche Beschreibungen, die zur gesellschaftlichen Spaltung beitragen, anstatt Lösungen anzubieten. Es ist das, was der Philosoph Daniel Schmachtenberger meint, wenn er sagt, dass die meisten News Outlets Propaganda sind, die wenig Informationen und viel Lärm erzeugen. Es gibt, in seinen Worten, kaum ‚High signal - low noise‘ outlets, die nicht voreingenommen sind.

Ich trage schon seit fast zwei Jahren die Idee mit mir herum, ein Online-Magazin herauszubringen, dass diese Probleme umschifft, und das komplexe, nuancierte und vor allem integrale und entwicklungsbezogene Artikel zum Zeitgeschehen herausbringt aber mit einem anderen Finanzierungsmodell arbeitet - und daher nicht gezwungen ist, zu polarisieren. Nämlich freiwillige Finanzierung durch Crowdfunding und Schwarm-Intelligenz. Denn
In den Vereinigten Staaten sind in den letzten Jahren einige außergewöhnlich erfolgreiche Online-Magazine entstanden, die auf so einem alternativen ökonomischen Ansatz basieren und damit die Möglichkeit haben, neue Perspektiven und Kontexte anzubieten. Sie bieten nuancierte Inhalte frei an, laufen ohne Werbung, und verlassen sich auf die Schwarm-Intelligenz des Internets, dass gute Arbeit belohnt wird, und basieren damit vollkommen auf der freiwilligen Unterstützung der Leser.
Solche Magazine sind natürlich Vorbild. Im Gegensatz zu diesen Magazinen ziele ich aber auf ein Magazin ab, dass auch die langfristige soziale und psychologische Entwicklungsperspektiven mit berücksichtigt, und das heißt, integrale, komplexe und nuancierte Artikel, die eine Vielzahl von Perspektiven zu einem Thema zu umfassen und zu integrieren wissen. Dabei gilt es nicht nur, große historische Perspektiven zuwenden, sondern auch die neuesten Erkenntnisse aus Entwicklungspsychologie, Philosophie und Sozialwissenschaften.

Ich werde also im Oktober diesen Jahres ein Magazin veröffentlichen,  dass vielfältige Perspektiven zu gegebenen Themen präsentieren und damit ein umfangreiches Bild der Wirklichkeit erzeugen kann, während es gleichzeitig auf die Schwarm-Intelligenz vertraut. Ein Magazin, dass einen angemessen KONTEXT für das Zeitgeschehen ermöglicht. Jede Perspektive hat, auch wenn sie unvollständig ist, einen wahren Kern. Und nur, wenn man sie alle zusammennimmt, kann man sicherstellen, einigermaßen passend und angemessen in der Welt handeln zu können.
Durch meine langjährige Arbeit als Verleger verfüge ich über die Kapazitäten und die sozialen Kontakte, um so ein Magazin ins Leben zu rufen. Autoren und Redakteure müssen allerdings bezahlt werden (Qualitäts-Artikel sind teuer!), ebenso der Aufbau einer Website, technisches Equipment und Werbemaßnahmen. Aus diesem Grund suche ich eure Unterstützung, bis die Seite sich selbst und seine Autoren tragen kann. Ich rechne damit, dass es 1-3 Jahre dauert, bis sich die Seite stabil selbst erhalten kann. 
 Die Zeiten verändern sich. Nur, indem wir unsere Perspektiven erweitern sind wir fähig, uns in dieser sich rapide verändernden Welt angemessen zu verhalten. Wenn sie jedoch auch mit den gegenwärtigen Medien unzufrieden sind, aber ihr Weltbild erweitern wollen, dann bitte ich Sie um Ihre Unterstützung. Lassen Sie uns mit der Zeit gehen und gemeinsam neue Beschreibungen der Wirklichkeit ermöglichen, und damit unser Bild wie wir uns selbst und die Welt, in und mit der wir wohnen, beschreiben können. Denn nur wenn wir eine richtige Landkarte haben, können wir angemessen handeln.

story:
Rise in Excellence,

My name is DjaDja N Medjay, some of you know me as ‘Jaja’. I am sending you uplifting vibes as you read this introduction…I also send them if you are not currently reading this introduction.

…yup…even if you are not! 

Over the past decade, I have continually fashioned an all-black literary universe based on melanin biotechnology called The Renpet Phenomenon. With two Afrofuturistic Novels currently self-published, I continue my goal to join the many Black Authors establishing our own genre.

My technique for story writing embodies an organic approach that draws upon several decades of personal study/practice of internal exercises and sciences, operating a massage therapy/bodywork practice, and an interest in spiritual mechanics.

Pushing through inertia and other self-created projections that inhibit progress, I completed my manuscript for my third novel, Rising Depth and now…it is ready for editing to be into existence.

This is where you can offer your support!!!

 

Story

Rising Depth is an Afrofuturistic adventure/drama (for lack of better terms) that follows social worker, Peter Sekham, an introvert social worker, looking forward to going on vacation to get away from Novus City—which has become a city in chaos after emerging Solar Flare Storms and the effects of Mass Gentrification. Before he can go on and get away from it all…Directive Living…the Global Health Enterprise that employs him, has one more task for him…a task that will be exceedingly difficult.

Sekham, a brilliant but somewhat non-committal individual, is currently having second thoughts about the ethics of his job and his current lady friend. But all that changes when he meets his next case, Mafdet, a young woman who is coming to grips with the changes in her relationship AND possibly being a gatekeeper. Peter is confronted with the unsettling realization that Directive Living might not be the global health patriot they are made out to be. His revelation will take him into a dark world of deceit, eugenics and bio-technological inhumane experimentation…plus Mafdet’s inability to control the wormholes she unconsciously generates.

Rising Depth​ premise is The Darkest Minds meets elements of Black Panther ​as Peter is quickly pulled into unimaginable situations of the inner-workings of the heart/emotions and the newly discovered connection between melanin and etheric energy—against the backdrop of a series Solar Flare Storms that may redefine the course of humanity…forever.

Afrofuturistic Novel Synopsis

Peter wants to go a vacation to get away from social work, Mass Gentrification and the Solar Flare Storms in Novus City. However, before he can do that…he must see one more case…Mafdet. Unknowingly to him, her case will open gateways that may vacate the hidden intentions of Directive Living…the Global Health Enterprise that Peter works for…

 

Goals

The goal of the crowdfunding is to raise $7,000 to produce Rising Depth, the prelude and first phase in The Renpet Phenomenon Book Series.

Funds will go towards editing of Rising Depth, cover design by renown project artist Mshindo for Rising Depth and previous released Afrofuturistic Novel, the pursuance of printing through a Black-Owned Printing company, marketing strategies along with associated merchandise and the re-editing of Renpet, our first Afrofuturistic Novel.

In addition, any remaining funds will go into the prototype of a graphic novel and partnering with health advocates, musicians and arts to create Afro-Futuristic Health minded products.

 

Support

One of the most ideal situations that we thought could think of here is 7,000 supporters contributing $2 each. As well as 700 supporters contributing $10 each and so on.

However, to ensure we reach our we figure, we ask our participants to really dig deep and contribute their WORD OF MOUTH (along with a comfortable amount of monetary support).

In this way the above models of contribution have a real opportunity to shine.

Here are the ways you can support:

1. Join the Rise of Excellence and Invest in The Rising Depth Crowdfunding (the amount you feel comfortable with!)

2. Share our link on your Social Media channels as well as tag a friend, especially those interested in Black Speculative Fiction, Anime, Comics and SciFi.

3. Word of Mouth. Tell a friend about Rising Depth Indiegogo Crowdfunding and how they can get involved. You can easily accomplish this by text or Facebook Messenger/Whatsapp.

 

For your support

For our crowdfunding we have an assortment of rewards. Including auto-graphed paperbacks, t-shirts and wellness guides along with other developing perks. These perks are more than a show of appreciation, they are projections of a movement to establish and bring prosperity to a culturally centered literary genre for melanated people worldwide.
 

About the Creator

DjaDja Medjay is a New York City native, and practicing Massage Therapist. As a youth he developed an interest in the interaction of the body’s processes with the nature surrounding it. That interest grew into the interaction of the melanin systems within the body with solar, cosmic and terrestrial forces. The purpose of his work is to establish the PROJECTION of LITERARY WORK that REFLECTS BLACK CULTURE AND INNATE NATURAL BIO-TECHNOLOGICAL PERSPECTIVE.

Published works include self-published Afrofuturistic Novels series: Renpet and N Eternity Reclaimed.

Besides pursuing his aspirations for Afrofuturism, DjaDja spends a great deal of his time studying the aspects of the human body, particularly the melanated body through his massage practice, daily internal exercises, postural senior citizen health programs and meditation.

Rise in Excellence,

DjaDja N Medjay

The Renpet Phenomenon

story:
Short Summary

NC Magazine is the wellness, lifestyle, and culture platform for millennial and Gen - Z creative entrepreneurs. We are a group of self- motivated creative entrepreneurs who find the path often taken, as mundane. Founded December 16, 2018, NC Magazine enlightens and inspires creative entrepreneurs through the stories and wisdom of other creatives. We seek to break societal molds and create the lives we desire. By doing this, our passion is evident in the content we produce, inspiring other millennials and Gen - Z entrepreneurs to do the same and follow their dreams fearlessly.

Team NC has tirelessly worked to provide new and innovative content to inspire and enlightened creative entrepreneurs, and now we need your help! We are raising $15,000 to expand our reach and impact in the creative entrepreneur community! We have sown many seeds, and with your help, we may finally be able to reap the benefits!

Atlanta, Georgia is one of the fasted growing cities with Entrepreneurs and NC Magazine is looking to make its mark as the leading platform dedicated to servicing and informing Creative Entrepreneurs in the region. 

What We Need & What You Get

$15,000 is a hefty number and we're sure you'd like to know where your valuable dollar would be going. Check out our funds allocation breakdown: 

How funds will be allocated:

Paid Team Members (Only 4 out of the 12 team members are paid)

Marketing

New Website Design

T- ShirtRestock

New Merchandise

Upcoming Events

Travel to Essence Fest

General Travel

Print Magazine

Makeup & Hair for Photo and Video Shoots

Trademarking, Business Incorporation, Non-Profit Incorporation

Accounting Services

Legal Services

General Business Expenses

Perks: Donate Any of the following amounts to receive special gifts from us! 

$1 - $49: Digital Thank You Email

$50 - $150: Digital Thank You Email, an exclusive Lilac Reign Discount Code, Special Thank You on Our Social Channels

$151 - $300: Digital Thank You Email, an exclusive Lilac Reign Discount Code, Special Thank You on Our Social Channels, Lilac Reign Tee, and First Look at our NC Mag Print Edition

$301 - $500: Digital Thank You Email, an exclusive Lilac Reign Discount Code, Special Thank You on Our Social Channels, Lilac Reign Tee, and a Limited Edition Print Copy of the Inaugural NC Magazine

> $500: Digital Thank You Email, an exclusive Lilac Reign Discount Code, Special Thank You on Our Social Channels, Lilac Reign Tee, First Look at our NC Mag Print Edition, and Donor Mention in the Print Magazine

 

The Impact

From the beginning, we have always betted on ourselves with great prevail. NC Magazine consists of a team of 13, ranging from New York City down to Atlanta, Georgia. After only being in business for 6 months, NC Mag has had the awesome opportunities to work with brands such as Nike, Abercrombie & Fitch, Design Essentials and more! Being self-funded, thus far, we have had a great impact on the Atlanta community and are looking to expand our reach. We intend to not only create content and share stories of successful millennial and Gen-Z entrepreneurs, but we also intend to give more and greater job opportunities to creatives in our community.

 

Risks & Challenges

We only have 60 days to reach our goal but we are more than confident we will exceed our expectations. From our inception, we have prided ourselves in being a self-funded business. As time went on, that great responsibility has hindered us from creating awesome content. Being a business of progression, we hope that with your help, we will be able to continue to build out this platform and not have to put a pause on the team's amazing creativity.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate just yet? No worries! Spread the word and make others aware of our cause! a simple retweet and repost could expose our campaign to the right people! There are multiple share tools here on Indiegogo. You can also repost and tag us on all of our handles below! 

Instagram: @ncmag_

Twitter: @ncmag_

Facebook: @niachantalonline

story:
Who is the founder of AMAZN and why is this publication necessary?

Hi, Pranav Iyer here! A little background on me if you don't know who I am -- I am a former Indian American collegiate football player who witnessed firsthand the struggles of being such a drastic minority in the sport. Through the lack of representation, constant stereotypes, and my own culture’s expectations and norms, I was the last person people expected to have dreams in a sport that wasn’t table tennis, badminton, or cricket. Along the ride, I was ridiculed and made a mockery of through slurs and disses, from the stereotypical ‘go back to math class’ to ‘Slumdog Millionaire.' I saw so many of my peers grow up with similar sports dreams as I did, only to have them dashed because of their own lack of faith or pressure from their surrounding communities.

See, a lot of this boils down to representation (yes, I know it's such an overused word). But even though there isn't a significant presence of Asian Americans at the highest levels of sports, for those that make it to that level, they usually go completely under the radar. How do I know this? Over the past year, I have dedicated much of my time to uncovering these stories and I realized that there are so many cases of underreported stars walking right in front of us -- the types of examples that would have given my peers and so many other Asian American youth the assurance that they can succeed in an unconventional field as well. If you want to check out those stories to get a better sense of the vastness of the community and what inspired me to launch this publication, feel free to check out these links: The Rise of Asian American Basketball (http://getsportsfocus.com/High_School-detail/th...), 0.4% - The Struggle, Identity and Pride of Asian Americans in Football (http://getsportsfocus.com/High_School-detail/th...)

Since the existence of the Asian American diaspora, the community has been greatly underserved in so many regards, especially media. That is why AMAZN's mission is to give a voice to perpetually undercovered and misrepresented Asian American athletes with the intention to accurately portray the community, eradicate misinformed stereotypes and instigate inspiration for the next generation of Asian American youth.

 

What type of content will be featured and who will be covered?

AMAZN will consist of a website (AMAZNHQ.com) and social media platforms, including YouTube, Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook. The website will be the host to video, written, and audio content.

WHAT

  • Video
    • Player highlights, player profiles, event recaps, and short documentaries
  • Written
    • National news, player profiles, columns, long-form issue stories, and Player Tribune-type pieces
  • Audio 
    • Podcasts, interviews

WHO

  • High school athletes
  • College athletes
  • Domestic and overseas professional athletes
  • Asian American sports leagues and tournaments

 

Why I am asking for your help

This is a startup publication, but I don't want it to seem like one. My plan is to get this venture off and running from day one. Here are some of the upfront costs that I am dealing with:

  • Equipment
    • Camera, lenses, tripods, hard drives, and microphones 
  • Website
    • Domain, and hosting
  • Travel
    • Transportation cost for commute throughout California and potentially elsewhere
  • Staff (future)
    • Pay reporters, designers, and others for their work down the road

At this moment, this is a one-man project. However, I am seeking the help of volunteer reporters who are passionate about the cause. And hopefully, this can be a larger operation in the future so that the diaspora residing all around the country can be fully covered. 

 

How you can help

Obviously, the most tangible way of helping my vision is through donating to the cause -- any amount helps! But I understand that, even if this is a cause you are passionate about, you may not be in a place right now where you can pitch in monetarily. And that is completely fine!

Here are other ways to help:

  • Share this campaign on social media
  • Spread the word of the publication
  • Volunteer yourself or refer other Asian American reporters to help further coverage
  • View and share content
  • Pitch me story ideas

I am also seeking sponsorships from organizations that actively seek to promote the Asian American narrative. So if you would like to partner in that way or know of organizations that would potentially be interested, please contact me!

 

Where you can find AMAZN (after it's launched)

Website - AMAZNHQ.com.

Social media 

  • Youtube - AMAZN HQ Media (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAUwRxRpxYy0fv...)
  • Twitter - coming soon
  • Instagram - coming soon
  • Facebook - coming soon

 

How to contact me

Want to hear more about my vision, pitch me stories, talk about sponsorships, provide me advice, or anything else? Feel free to reach out to me at any time at iyer.pranav4@gmail.com.

Whether you can help out or not, I am greatly thankful that you took your time reading through my vision! Now let's rewrite the narrative one step at a time!
story_txt:
Who is the founder of AMAZN and why is this publication necessary?
Hi, Pranav Iyer here! A little background on me if you don't know who I am -- I am a former Indian American collegiate football player who witnessed firsthand the struggles of being such a drastic minority in the sport. Through the lack of representation, constant stereotypes, and my own culture’s expectations and norms, I was the last person people expected to have dreams in a sport that wasn’t table tennis, badminton, or cricket. Along the ride, I was ridiculed and made a mockery of through slurs and disses, from the stereotypical ‘go back to math class’ to ‘Slumdog Millionaire.' I saw so many of my peers grow up with similar sports dreams as I did, only to have them dashed because of their own lack of faith or pressure from their surrounding communities.
See, a lot of this boils down to representation (yes, I know it's such an overused word). But even though there isn't a significant presence of Asian Americans at the highest levels of sports, for those that make it to that level, they usually go completely under the radar. How do I know this? Over the past year, I have dedicated much of my time to uncovering these stories and I realized that there are so many cases of underreported stars walking right in front of us -- the types of examples that would have given my peers and so many other Asian American youth the assurance that they can succeed in an unconventional field as well. If you want to check out those stories to get a better sense of the vastness of the community and what inspired me to launch this publication, feel free to check out these links: The Rise of Asian American Basketball (http://getsportsfocus.com/High_School-detail/th...), 0.4% - The Struggle, Identity and Pride of Asian Americans in Football (http://getsportsfocus.com/High_School-detail/th...)
Since the existence of the Asian American diaspora, the community has been greatly underserved in so many regards, especially media. That is why AMAZN's mission is to give a voice to perpetually undercovered and misrepresented Asian American athletes with the intention to accurately portray the community, eradicate misinformed stereotypes and instigate inspiration for the next generation of Asian American youth.
 

What type of content will be featured and who will be covered?
AMAZN will consist of a website (AMAZNHQ.com) and social media platforms, including YouTube, Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook. The website will be the host to video, written, and audio content.
WHAT

VideoPlayer highlights, player profiles, event recaps, and short documentaries

WrittenNational news, player profiles, columns, long-form issue stories, and Player Tribune-type pieces

Audio Podcasts, interviews


WHO

High school athletes
College athletes
Domestic and overseas professional athletes
Asian American sports leagues and tournaments

 
Why I am asking for your help
This is a startup publication, but I don't want it to seem like one. My plan is to get this venture off and running from day one. Here are some of the upfront costs that I am dealing with:

EquipmentCamera, lenses, tripods, hard drives, and microphones 

WebsiteDomain, and hosting

TravelTransportation cost for commute throughout California and potentially elsewhere

Staff (future)Pay reporters, designers, and others for their work down the road


At this moment, this is a one-man project. However, I am seeking the help of volunteer reporters who are passionate about the cause. And hopefully, this can be a larger operation in the future so that the diaspora residing all around the country can be fully covered. 
 

How you can help
Obviously, the most tangible way of helping my vision is through donating to the cause -- any amount helps! But I understand that, even if this is a cause you are passionate about, you may not be in a place right now where you can pitch in monetarily. And that is completely fine!
Here are other ways to help:

Share this campaign on social media
Spread the word of the publication
Volunteer yourself or refer other Asian American reporters to help further coverage
View and share content
Pitch me story ideas

I am also seeking sponsorships from organizations that actively seek to promote the Asian American narrative. So if you would like to partner in that way or know of organizations that would potentially be interested, please contact me!
 
Where you can find AMAZN (after it's launched)

story:
Short Summary

From the author and the illustrator who brought you, Unicorn's Picnic, a new collaborative project emerges, Unicorns are Assholes.

The response from Unicorn's Picnic was so encouraging, April Hilland and Rebeca Dávila Ortiz decided to create a book about unicorns just for adults!

Unicorns are Assholes is an adult picture book for people who hate unicorns.  Just kidding.   Unlike most unicorn books you have read before, Unicorns are Assholes is as awkward and humorous  as you and your friends.   

What We Need & What You Get

Your support of this book means a lot. This is my second collaboration with the talented Rebeca Dávila Ortiz, and this book really can only exist with your help. All funds from this campaign go to the book's artwork, printing, and shipping. 

Your support means a few other important things, too:

1) It's easy to admire and fall into the "unicorn trap" of social media filters and edited upbeat posts about your day to day life.  This book, Unicorns are Assholes, takes the filter off of unicorns and shows the very real and awkward world of unicorns.

2) The very talented illustrator, Rebeca Dávila Ortiz is paid fairly for her time and effort. 

3) I have a few other books in the works, and your support now may allow me to work on and release some other interesting projects. 

Risks & Challenges

At this point, the risks and challenges are behind us. The story is written and the manuscript is finalized. The illustrations are completed and printing will be completed through a printer in Victoria, BC, Canada. This project is set and ready to go! We just need the final funds to give our book wings. It’s up to you to be part of this success story!

Other Ways You Can Help

It's okay if you can't contribute, there are other ways to help a gal out:

  • Post this link to any and all social media sites and invite your friends to support this project.
  • Forward this campaign to anyone who may need a laugh at a unicorn's expense, they'll thank you ; )

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The story so far...

The Show...

Experience the incredible true story of Ireland’s 1798 Rebellion through song, imagery and storytelling in the capable hands of historical entertainer and musician Paddy Cullivan. Inspired by the American and French Revolutions of the late-18th Century, the ’10 Dark Secrets of 1798’ is a historical drama of 'Hamilton' and ‘Game of Thrones’ proportions, bringing a staggering array of characters to life. Wolfe Tone, Lord Edward Fitzgerald and Napper Tandy - George Washington, The ‘Mad King’ George III and Napoleon Bonaparte. Huge battles, victories and losses from the epic Wexford Rebellion to the unbelievable ’Year of the French’…and most importantly, the timeless call of the United Irishmen (and women!) to unite ‘Protestant, Catholic and Dissenter’…

The Book

My name is Paddy Cullivan - I'm a historical entertainer and writer. I was born in Galway and have a NCAD degree in visual communication and art history. I've also been a professional musician, composer and satirical comedian for 20 years and I've brought all these elements together to create popular multimedia shows that make history thrilling for live audiences.

I've toured my 1798 show in theatres and venues since 2018 to thousands of people. One question I'm asked after every show is 'where is the book?' because people love the stories and secrets I've revealed and want something tangible to take away. I enjoy the live aspect of what I do but the audience are right - having enlightened them to this incredible episode in Irish (and world) history, I need to publish it in book form. 

By supporting my work you will see me create a brand that presents history in a new and accessible way (as well as getting the finished work for yourself!). I want you to be as excited and challenged by the 1798 rebellion as my audiences have been. I also want to make something of long-lasting artistic value, so I'll put as much into the design as I do into the writing. And finally, I believe this story of one-time unity between all the peoples on the island is so important, it can have an effect on modern Ireland and help point the way to a hopeful future together.

What I Need & What You Get

I'm looking for €20,000 to produce this book. I need funds to further research, write, illustrate, print and publish it. I'll be publishing 5000 hard copies, about half of which I estimate will go to funders, the rest to be sold at shows to help the book self-fund into the future. I also need the funds to create the website, expenses, extras and perks around the book - and use it as a foundation for a documentary and/or TV series.

Perks include the beautifully finished book, unique pieces like a hand-drawn map of the French advance through Connacht or a faithfully-reproduced  United Irishman membership uniquely printed on parchment, with your name written and numbered by the author. Your name will appear in the book and some perks will even get you free tickets to live performances of the show and a special book launch show for funders. For premium funders, you get all of the above and a personal performance of the show for a group in your area at an agreed venue, in Ireland or internationally.

If I don't reach my entire goal I will have to reduce the amount of product / perks I produce - but I'm hoping to surpass it and give the book a real chance of reaching as wide an audience as possible, with your help.

The Impact

The story of 1798 confounds all our preconceptions about Irish identity. The enlightenment brought together people of all classes and religious backgrounds in an effort to create a new kind of society. This message still resonates as 21st century Ireland approaches possible unity in a post-Brexit world. If we learn about this past where Protestant, Catholic and Dissenter (Presbyterian) came together, it gives us an inspiring signpost for the future - and that's a very exciting project for myself and funders to be involved in. With your help we get the story out there and start a true understanding of our shared history.

I have performed the show over 100 times and it now sells out in arts centres, theatres and at festivals from Belfast to Cork and including the Dublin Festival of History, Kilkenomics and the Dalkey Book Festival. This gives the book a ready-made audience and a proven track-record of success so your investment will be in something that makes a real impact.

Recent artistic endeavours like 'John Adams', 'Hamilton' and 'Game of Thrones' have shown that people really love history and a strong, complex narrative as long as it is accessible and includes them. From 20 years in the entertainment business I know how to bring an audience with me and my passion is to do so to as wide an audience as possible.

Risks & Challenges

We are living in a time of unprecedented change - and for working creative people nothing will be the same again. My work as a gigging musician and touring these shows used to provide funds for projects - I would never have asked for help before. The converse of that was that I was working so much there was little time to complete work of this nature. That's all changed and with the Coronavirus lockdown I will have no public work for at least 6 months. 

I know that many of you will be watching every cent too, so I understand how hard fundraising will be at this time. However, I want to produce something unique that will bring hope, enlightenment and education after this terrible time is over. And I believe if we help each other out we will get through this and have an incredible amount of great work created as a bonus. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help: I'd love you to get the word out and using the Indiegogo share tools, let the history-lovers in your life know about this project. Many thanks!

story:
Who We Are & What We're Doing

Hello, I'm Michael Adams. I created Planet X Publications as a vehicle for publishing unique and high-quality original fiction that dwells at the intersection points of science-fiction, fantasy, horror, the weird, and high-strangeness.

Think of Jack Kirby channeling ancient astronaut theory in The Eternals or his any of his Fourth World books, William Hope Hodgson playing with concepts of life, death, cosmic-scale time, the afterlife, the alien, and the otherworldly in The House on the Borderland, or the morbid inventiveness and interplay of gods, men, and magic in Clark Ashton Smith's Zothique cycle stories and you'll begin to have an idea of both the aesthetic and the content we are looking for.

For our flagship title, we submit Test Patterns for your consideration. It will be a collection of short speculative fictions written with classic television shows such as The Outer Limits, The Twilight Zone, and The Night Gallery in mind. Richly varied stories which might impart a moral, inspire thought, offer meaning, inspire hope, or instill dread. Tales told in unique ways, employing provocative twists and surprises, and exploring the universal themes of humanity and self-discovery through the lenses of horror, fantasy, and science fiction.

Author, webmaster, and musician Duane Pesice of Planet Moderan Press is serving as editor-in-chief of this volume, bringing in diverse talent from (literally) around the world to delight and disturb our readers with brand new tales of the weird and otherworldly.

While still being subject to change, this premier volume of Test Patterns is slated to include new works by Matthew M. Bartlett, Arinn Dembo, Ashley Dioses, Jordan Krall, J.B. Lee, Frederick J. Mayer, K.A. Opperman, Duane Pesice, Joseph S. Pulver, Sr., Christopher Ropes, John Claude Smith, Jeffrey Thomas, Scott Thomas, Sarah Walker, & Can Wiggins.

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • Every dollar you pledge in this campaign will go directly to getting this book published; firstly towards paying our authors, editor, and artists, and then to actual production costs of having the book formatted and printed.

  • For your hard-earned dollars what we are offering is the book itself, available in three different formats; digital only, paperback, and a limited edition hardcover. The hardcover will be limited to 100 copies at the absolute most, though our print run on it may be less depending on demand.

story:
The Book - the story

"The malls were crowded with last minute shoppers.  A blanket of snow covered the ground as the echoes of children caroling were heard through the silence of the evening. Up at the North Pole, the reindeer were harnessed to Santa’s sleigh. The gifts were all loaded and Zippy, Santa’s head elf was waiting to help Santa with his deliveries.  It was a Christmas Eve like every other, so they thought."

When Santa gets stuck in a chimney, a firefighter named Nathan helps to get him out. Santa is so thankful, he asks Nathan to help them for the rest of the night.  And it’s a good thing they did.

In Santa and His Super Hero, you will read about Santa’s misadventures that Christmas evening and how his Super Hero, a fire fighter named Nathan helped him out.

 

 

The Cause - not just a Book

When we decided we were going to publish the book, we thought that we would like to help people with the sales of Santa and His Super Hero.  Since a fire fighter was so helpful to Santa that night, we thought that we would help the fire fighters. We decided that net proceeds of the sale of our book will be given to the BC Professional Fire Fighters’ Burn Fund (BCPFFABF). 

The Burn Fund not only helps the survivors of fires across British Columbia, they are also big on the education and prevention of fires and injuries due to fire.  Another thing the BC Burn Fund does is in the summer they run a camp for children who are burn survivors.

Their new project is the Burn Fund Center.  A brand new building at main Street and East 23rd Avenue in Vancouver will be an affordable place for caregivers to stay as their loved ones are being treated for their injuries at either Children’s Hospital of the Trauma and Plastics Unit at Vancouver General Hospital (VGH). There are a couple reasons we picked the BC Professional Fire Fighters Burn Fund.

  1. The story is about Santa getting stuck in a chimney and a fire fighter saves him.
  2. Later in the book they come across a chimney fire and the fire fighter puts out the fire so that Santa can safely deliver his presents.
  3. Getting burned in a fire is often a devastating and life changing experience.  The BC Professional Burn fund does great work with burn survivors of all ages.  Please check out their website at burnfund.org for more information about the BC Professional Fire Fighters Burn Fund.

In order to be able to donate as much money as possible, we decided to do this crowd-funding. 

 

 

Before the Book - Background Story

Every Christmas since Nathan was born, we would go to the CityTV Breakfast Television FoodBank Friday in Vancouver.  The first time we went, we were interviewed by host Dawn Chubai.  When Nathan was just 1 year old, I started a company called Anything on a Clock.  Since then, whenever we went to FoodBank Friday, we would donate part proceeds of our November sales to the Food Bank.

On December 4th, 2009, we went to the FoodBank Friday broadcast as we always had.  But this time was different.  Shortly after we arrived, a firetruck rolled in. Generally, Nathan is a bit groggy when we go to these events.  They start at 6:00 am and because we like to be there near the beginning, and then hang out for a bit, we usually leave the house around 5:00 am.  

But when the fire truck arrived, Nathan got really excited.  Off camera, before our interview, Dawn Chubai asked Nathan why he was so excited.  Nathan being 3 1/2 years old at the time pointed to the firetruck and said “Super Heroes”.

During our interview, Dawn asked Nathan again about the firefighters and he told Dawn that they were Super Heroes.  

After our spot, they cut to Riaz Meghji who did an interview about the upcoming Santa Clause Parade.  Then it was the firefighter’s turn.  While Riaz was doling his thing, host Greg Harper asked if Nathan would like to join him at the firetruck for his segment. 

...and so it all began

That was the first time that Nathan connected his Super Heroes (firefighters) to Santa.  That evening when I tucked him into bed, I asked him for ideas for his bedtime story.
 
He asked me “What would happen if Santa got stuck in a chimney?  Do you think firefighters would help them?”
 
As Christmas grew closer, he would give different suggestions about how Santa got stuck in a chimney and how a firefighter came to his rescue.  Each night he would begin by giving a different scenario.  After a few nights I saw a pattern in our story telling so when he fell asleep each night, I would go to my computer and write down the story that we just made up.
 
By Christmas, we had a lot of different adventures that Santa and his Super Hero would go on. They would all begin the same way; Santa would get caught in a chimney and a firefighter, his Super Hero, would pluck him out of the chimney.
 
Later that year, I found the stories on my computer and thought that I would put it into a story book for Nathan.  I wrote out the story similar to what we have today and the next year I would read it to Nathan as we got closer to Christmas instead of making up the stories.
 
Jump forward to the winter of 2014.  Christmas was approaching once again and Nathan asked me “When are we going to make this a real book?” I have been talking about it for the last few years but nothing came of it.  So I told him it was time we get it into print.
 
And that is how we came up with a story about how a firefighter helped Santa when he got stuck in a Chimney.

 

 

 

 Who want to be a Super Hero?

Getting a book illustrated, published and launched is quite a costly endeavor.  We have set up this fundraising to help pay for these expenses. We implore you to help fund this idea. The more money we can get from contributors to pay for these expenses, the more money we will have to give to the BC Professional Fire Fighters’ Burn Fund.
