story:
Sammanfattning

Med din hjälp kan vi öppna upp Almedalen, sänka medelåldern - och på sikt bidra till ett mer inkluderande politiskt klimat. 

Fler Unga i Almedalen riktar sig till ungdomar mellan 15 och 25 år från olika delar av samhället, utan tidigare engagemang inom det svenska politiska etablissemanget och med vilja och drivkraft att bygga sin egna politiska kompass samt att få träffa och bygga broar med likasinnade. 

För att öppna upp Almedalen för dessa ungdomar erbjuder Fler Unga resa och gemensamt boende till ett kraftigt reducerat pris. Det är denna satsning du kan vara med och stötta! Väl på plats i Almedalen kommer Fler Unga delta i seminarier och event samt kartlägga arbetet med inkludering. 
Det är till allas fördel att ungdomar inkluderas: samhället gagnas något enormt av att medborgare är informerade, har reell makt & inte hamnar i förlegade fack. 
 Den här kampanjen är oerhört viktig som ledstjärna i arbetet att bemöta normer & fördomar om unga. Därför behövs varje gåva!

Hej, mitt namn är Max Vesterlund Karlsson. 

Jag är född & uppvuxen i en förort utanför Stockholm och har länge kämpat för att fler röster ska höras i olika forum. Som ungdom från förorten kändes det smått hopplöst att försöka påverka lokala politiker - som vid tilltal ofta svarade med floskler som "Ni kommer att förstå när ni är äldre".  Det här är inte en unik känsla, och jag är helt övertygad om att många känner igen sig i vuxensamhällets fördomar om unga oavsett om vi kommer från landsbygd, storstad eller förort.

Idag är jag ordförande för den partipolitiskt obundna föreningen Fler Unga som har syftet att öka ungdomars politiska inflytande och att fungera som en plattform för spridning av kunskap & verktyg för påverkan. 

Initiativet till föreningen Fler Unga kom sommaren 2013 efter att Almedalsveckan hade ägt rum. Över 200 evenemang där ungdomars tillvaro diskuterades men antalet ungdomar på plats var en besvikelse. Det kändes som om vi kunde räkna antal närvarande på fingrarna. Vad är det egentligen för mening att diskutera unga utan de är på plats?

Ungdomar idag är mer engagerade än någonsin och vill vara med och påverka samhället. Att inte ta till vara på kraften hos unga, är att blunda för en enorm mängd kompetens, kreativitet och vilja. Genom att ifrågasätta den dystopiska fördomen om "dagens unga" som lat - vill vi visa vägen mot inkludering. Vi har under flera veckors tid tagit emot ansökningar (med stor spridning, från Boden till Helsingborg) - och mitt uppe i urvalsprocessen när detta skrivs.

Vi kommer att åka till almedalen i sommar - och det du kan bidra med, är att göra det så billigt som möjligt för våra deltagare att åka med. Att priserna för att delta under veckan ofta är löjligt höga är ingen hemlighet och vi ställer oss emot att din inkomst ska vara en avgörande faktor för huruvida du blir lyssnad på eller inte under en av de största sammanslutningarna i Sveriges politiska etablissemang.


Fler Unga i Almedalen 2015 har syftet:

  • Att öppna upp det historiskt slutna politiska rummet för fler unga röster

  • Att öka representationen och sänka medelåldern där medelåldern är hög

  • Att bemöta normer kring ung kompetens

  • Att erbjuda unga ett forum & möjlighet till personlig utveckling


Vad vi behöver & vad du får

Eftersom vi tidigare saknat större ekonomiska medel och inte funnits registrerade som förening tillräckligt länge för att söka de flesta större bidrag förlitar vi oss på er, allmänheten & samarbetspartners.
Behovet av Fler Unga i Almedalen är stort, vilket vi såg redan förra året. Fler Unga fick enormt genomslag på sociala medier & deltog bl.a. i SVT Debatt vid hela tre tillfällen. Ibland är det svårt att känna att du passar in helt inom ramarna för ungdomsförbunden eller att du måste ställa upp på alla krav som kanske finns i andra organisationer - därför är det viktigt att det finns ett alternativ som gör att du kan delta utan tidigare ställningstagande eller engagemang.
Det finns inga dolda avgifter och allt arbete sker idéellt, vilket betyder att ditt stöd aldrig kommer att hamna i någons privata ficka. Efter projektet kommer vi att sammanställa en rapport med det ekonomiska utfallet - och vi strävar efter en så hög transparens som möjligt. Vi har också ett konto avsatt just för det här projektet. Fler Unga kommer att delta från 29 juni till 3 juli (måndag till fredag), och våra kostnader ser ut som följer: 
Boende för 18 personer strax utanför Visby
- 24000 kr
1 x Minibussar på plats för resa mellan boende - Visby
- 4000 kr
Resa till Gotland
- 17000 kr
Mat under veckan 
(vi kommer att laga egen mat för att hålla nere priset)
- 4000 kr
Totalt
- 49000 kr

Allt som allt kommer det alltså att kosta cirka 2950 kr per person att delta. Allt som vi samlar in & som ni väljer att ge går oavkortat till att göra almedalen mer inkluderande, genom göra vistelsen så billig som möjligt för våra deltagare.

Alla gåvor över 1000 kronor kommer att tackas offentligt genom våra sociala medier.

Vad kraften hos unga kommer att skapa på plats

Det bör utan tvekan vara ungas intresse som styr ungdomspolitiken. Fler Ungas idé är att agera som en plattform för spridning av kunskap och verktyg för påverkan med syftet att öka ungdomars inflytande. Det går inte att överdriva hur viktigt det är att inkludera alla i relevanta debatter & i samtal om framtiden; hur viktigt det är att unga ska ha en faktisk möjlighet att diskutera politik med landets makthavare.
Efter att ha undersökt vilka grupper som är underrepresenterade är det en som står ut: unga väljare utan existerande koppling till eventuellt ungdomsförbund eller lobbyorganisation samt ungdomar från ytterstad eller förort. Det är dessa som Fler Unga i Almedalen framför allt riktar sig till, med utgångsläget att hela det politiska etablissemanget i Almedalen och samhället i stort gagnas av så stor spridning på medborgare, väljare och olika röster som möjligt.
På plats kommer Fler Unga att delta på utvalda seminarier där medelåldern behöver sänkas eller när det diskuteras frågor som är relevanta för unga. Vi kommer att ställa frågor, ta plats i paneler, diskutera med andra organisationer & företag. Vi kommer att skapa ett inkluderande sammanhang för unga på plats, och rapportera arbetet dagligen på sociala medier!

Andra sätt som du kan hjälpa till

Ingen kan göra allt, men alla kan göra något. Alla kan inte bidra ekonomiskt, men du kan hjälpa på andra sätt! 

  • Dela & sprid kampanjen genom Indiegogos delningsverktyg - visa att kraften hos unga är ett ämne som måste upp på dagordningen!
  • Involvera unga i din närhet & våga ge plats
  • Gilla & kommentera våra inlägg på sociala medier
  • Prata med vänner, kollegor & familj - alla kan bidra med något!

Sammanfattning 
Med din hjälp kan vi öppna upp Almedalen, sänka medelåldern - och på sikt bidra till ett mer inkluderande politiskt klimat. 
Fler Unga i Almedalen riktar sig till ungdomar mellan 15 och 25 år från olika delar av samhället, utan tidigare engagemang inom det svenska politiska etablissemanget och med vilja och drivkraft att bygga sin egna politiska kompass samt att få träffa och bygga broar med likasinnade. 

För att öppna upp Almedalen för dessa ungdomar erbjuder Fler Unga resa och gemensamt boende till ett kraftigt reducerat pris. Det är denna satsning du kan vara med och stötta! Väl på plats i Almedalen kommer Fler Unga delta i seminarier och event samt kartlägga arbetet med inkludering. 
Det är till allas fördel att ungdomar inkluderas: samhället gagnas något enormt av att medborgare är informerade, har reell makt & inte hamnar i förlegade fack. 
 Den här kampanjen är oerhört viktig som ledstjärna i arbetet att bemöta normer & fördomar om unga. Därför behövs varje gåva! 
Hej, mitt namn är Max Vesterlund Karlsson. 
Jag är född & uppvuxen i en förort utanför Stockholm och har länge kämpat för att fler röster ska höras i olika forum. Som ungdom från förorten kändes det smått hopplöst att försöka påverka lokala politiker - som vid tilltal ofta svarade med floskler som "Ni kommer att förstå när ni är äldre".  Det här är inte en unik känsla, och jag är helt övertygad om att många känner igen sig i vuxensamhällets fördomar om unga oavsett om vi kommer från landsbygd, storstad eller förort.
Idag är jag ordförande för den partipolitiskt obundna föreningen Fler Unga som har syftet att öka ungdomars politiska inflytande och att fungera som en plattform för spridning av kunskap & verktyg för påverkan. 
Initiativet till föreningen Fler Unga kom sommaren 2013 efter att Almedalsveckan hade ägt rum. Över 200 evenemang där ungdomars tillvaro diskuterades men antalet ungdomar på plats var en besvikelse. Det kändes som om vi kunde räkna antal närvarande på fingrarna. Vad är det egentligen för mening att diskutera unga utan de är på plats?
Ungdomar idag är mer engagerade än någonsin och vill vara med och påverka samhället. Att inte ta till vara på kraften hos unga, är att blunda för en enorm mängd kompetens, kreativitet och vilja. Genom att ifrågasätta den dystopiska fördomen om "dagens unga" som lat - vill vi visa vägen mot inkludering. Vi har under flera veckors tid tagit emot ansökningar (med stor spridning, från Boden till Helsingborg) - och mitt uppe i urvalsprocessen när detta skrivs.

story:
The Project

Imagine if the fantastic horrors conceived by H.P. Lovecraft were less fiction than acts of bearing witness to  great and terrible cosmic truths. Imagine if Lovecraft, as the duly authorized "Recorder" selected by infernal authorities of which Lovecraft himself has only little knowledge, kept a record of the actual events to which he found himself quite unwillingly exposed.  Then imagine if a young editor and scholar, steeped in Lovecraftian knowledge, found these notes and edited them for publication in the year 2015.

There you have the basis for The Secret Life of H.P. Lovecraft by H.P. Lovecraft, "edited" by W.J. Renehan (biography below).

Our ambition right now is to pre-sell both the eBook and paper editions of the work in order to help fund the final prep, publishing, and distribution of both editions. In return for you buying "ahead of the curve," we're offering a heartfelt acknowledgment within the book itself.


How The Book Begins ...

Found among the papers of H.P. Lovecraft ...

Whoever is reading this, I must beg your discretion regarding the facts contained herein, for I fear their dissemination would only serve to generate widespread panic and madness.

The tale is my own, of course, and yet it is so much more. It is man’s—the black truths that reside within the labyrinthine depths of his ancient, primeval brain; the terrors beyond the scope of measure, whose mere mention induces psychosis and the search for oblivion.

Perhaps you will laugh, for if I am known at all in your time it will most surely be as a spinner of pulp fictions, only a hair’s breadth removed from the scribblers of the old Penny Dreadfuls. But I have no complaint with my lot, as I have been privy to sights and wonders beyond the ken of man. I did not ask for such gifts, and a great many I would gladly return, but I have come to reconcile my fear and wonder—the two merging to produce a type of terrible awe.

Are you a searcher like myself, I wonder? Do you have a love of the night sky? The ancient ruin? The unquiet grave? Are you discontented with a world dissected by science, nailed down by theories and figures, bled of possibility? If so, then perhaps you are fated to know the truth. I feel it is my duty to warn you, however; your life will be forever altered by the reading of this account. From here there is no going back. Nietzsche was quite right when he said: “When you gaze long into an abyss, the abyss also gazes into you.” You will have tapped into a new current, cursed and blessed both to see the world behind the world—or rather the world for what it truly is.

Do you dare to explore the unplumbed, atavistic depths of the primitive brain? To return to a more base, superstitious form of consciousness? To look upon the night sky with new eyes and see it not as a dead end but rather as a doorstep?

Should you be so inclined, I recommend you steel yourself for what lies beyond. Be forewarned. 


About the "Editor"

W.J. Renehan's books include The Art of Darkness: Meditations On the Effect of Horror Fiction and the novella Night's Harbor. 

Of The Art of Darkness, leading Lovecraft scholar Robert Waugh (author of The Monster in the Mirror: Looking for H.P. Lovecraft and Monster of Voices: Speaking for H.P. Lovecraft) says: "W. J. Renehan has written a comprehensive and concise account of the various theories of Horror, a difficult task though he lets none of the difficulty show, and thus this is a fine introduction to the field. But his book is more than theory; it also shares with the reader the weird pleasure we take in the field."

As regards Night's Harbor, critically-acclaimed horror author Michael Bray declares it "a meticulously crafted novella of suspense filled terror. Beautifully paced and wonderfully vivid, the story is as chilling as it is brutal." William Cook, author of Blood Related, describes the novel as: "Intelligent, erudite and well-written, Night’s Harbor is an exciting and down-right scary new work of Vampire fiction that will not be ignored.” Joseph Sale, author of The Darkest Touch, comments: "Night's Harbor reads like a sequence of disturbing dreams: each hallucination more frightening and maddening than the last." And techno-horror superstar Shane Stadler, author of the bestseller Exoskeleton, says: "This captivating vampire novella is not for the squeamish and will have you thinking twice about inviting anyone into your home."

When not working on his own writing, Renehan serves as editor-in-chief of Dark Hall Press, a small but highly respected publisher of horror fiction.


Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to helping with a purchase, please also consider spreading the word via any and all social media. Check out Indiegogo's tools for making this easier.

story:
Solar energy will save the world. Not just solar panels, but also solar heat, solar chill, solar fresh water, solar food, solar transportation, and of course solar power.

I am showing the world my inventions for the first time. I wrote "What's the Matter with Energy", WTMWE! The inventions described in my book will change the world. I want you to read about them. I want you to join this Solar Man revolution to change the world. You should read this colorful, personal, and insightful book.

Hi, I am Joe Hui, Solar Man. My mission is to save the 3E's:  Energy, Environment, and Education. I went to MIT as freshman and got my BS, MS, and PhD in 6 years. I am now Professor of Electrical and Energy Engineering at Arizona State University. 

But my real passion is to help the world live a comfortable yet sustainable life through my inventions. I am President and CEO of Monarch Power Corp. I spent all my time, talent, and money making things for you. Oh did I say I want to change the world? Not just by telling you about my inventions but have you use them. 

Always want to know everything about energy? This is an easy to understand book on the physics of Newton, Maxwell, and Einstein. Fascinated with the inventions of Archimedes, Edison, and Tesla? Read about them with Solar Man's.

Learn science and technology with fun! You'll be dazzled with the color and pictures in the book. You'll learn deep truths such as the Big Bang, black holes, quarks and strange particles, dark matter and energy, and Einstein's strange world of gravity and curved spacetime.

I want to build Solar Wonderland, a science amusement park based on WTMWE. You'll learn difficult things by riding in my Solar Man Maglev. You'll experience gravity and spacetime curvature by roller coaster rides. You'll feel the heat is on, with solar powered heat engines such as my Hui turbine. You'll see the light as Alice in the Optics Wonderland. You've got the power in the Tesla Tower.

For $1 only, I'll email you WTMWE right away with its leading chapter. For $10, I'll also email you chapter 4.  Titled Motion Wonderland, you learn about Archimedes' world, Goddard's rocketry, Tesla's turbine, and the most wonderful of all, my Hui turbine. Every US family should have one and go off-grid with solar thermal power!

For $40, I'll also send you in November a beautifully printed 9 -chapter large size book. For $100, I'll send you 4 books for small group or classroom studies. Don't miss this one time deep discount of book. Order 4 books and give 3 to your school and get a charitable tax deduction. 

Order them as Christmas gifts for your kids or your friends. Show them you believe in renewable energy. Go save the planet and the environment. Teach them  learning is fun, exciting, and inspiring.

story:
¿Quiénes somos? Who we are?

APERC, por sus siglas significa Asociación Peruana de Rough Collie. 
APERC, for its acronym means Peruvian Association of Rough Collie.

Somos un grupo de criadores y propietarios de Rough Collie que, en beneficio de ellos, promovemos actividades de reunión, participamos en distintas exposiciones de belleza canina, campeonatos de agility y marchas benéficas. Pero esencialmente, somos una gran familia unida por el amor a la raza inmortalizada décadas atrás por la famosa Lassie.
We are a group of breeders and owners of Rough Collies, that for their benefit, promote activities, participate in several show dogs, agility championships and charitable marches. But essentially, we are a big family united by love for the breed that decades ago was immortalized by the famous Lassie.

Como Asociación nuestra meta es lograr la mejora de la Raza Rough Collie en nuestro país, no unicamente por cumplir con un estandar internacional de estructura, sino principalmente por evitar el deterioro genético que se ve representado en problemas de salud en los perros.
As an association our goal is to improve the breed in our country, not only to comply with an international standard of structure, but mainly to avoid genetic deterioration that is represented in health problems in dogs.

¿Qué hacemos? What we do?

Hace un tiempo que realizamos infografías en especial acerca de los cuidados que debemos tener con la sensibilidad a los fármacos y con ciertos alimentos, hay un cuadro que ha sido muy difundido a nivel internacional tanto en español como en inglés, tal vez lo has visto antes, es el siguiente:
We have done some infographics, especially about the care we must have with drug sensitivity and certain foods, there is a chart which have been widespread internationally in both Spanish and English, maybe you have seen it before, is this one: 

Este cuadro se realizó con la información de la dra. Maribel Pelaez de Lucas, una criadora española de collies. Esta forma de cooperación traspasando fronteras y la creación de una red internacional de amigos del collie, nos llevó a la idea de crear una revista bilingüe, así poder llegar a más propietarios de esta raza haciendo una publicación en dos de los idiomas más importantes: español e inglés. 
This chart was done with the information of dr. Maribel Pelaez de Lucas, a spanish collie breeder. This form of cooperation "without borders" and the creation of an international network of collie friends, led us to the idea of making a bilingual magazine, so we can reach more owners of this breed by a publication in the two major languages: Spanish and English.

¿Qué queremos? What do we want?

Esta campaña surge para recaudar los fondos necesarios para la impresión de esta nuestra primera publicación de SUMAQ, la revista bilingüe especializada del Rough Collie. Cada dolar que pueda ser donado suma, pues lo que necesitamos para la impresión de un millar de revistas es aproximadamente s/1500.00 ($500)
Puedes donar a través de un pago con tu tarjeta de crédito (visa o mastercard) o cuenta paypal.

This campaign was created to raise the necessary funds for printing our first publication of SUMAQ, the bilingual journal of the Rough Collie.
Every dollar that can be donated will be appreciated, for printing a thousand magazines we need about s/ 1500.00 (aprox. $ 500) You can donate by paying with a credit card (visar or mastercard) or using a paypal account.


Desafío Challenge

No es fácil lograr una recaudación como esta, sin embargo tenemos la fe que se puede lograr, así como invertimos nuestro tiempo en crear y compartir información que puede salvar la vida de muchos collies, esperamos que mucha gente invierte un poco de dinero en ayudarnos a cumplir nuestra meta.

It is not easy to achieve a fund like this, but we have the faith that can be achieved, as we invested our time on creating and sharing information that can save the lives of many collies, we hope that many people invest a little money in helping us meet our goal.

¿No tienes tarjeta de crédito? ¿No tienes paypal? Aun así nos puedes ayudar
Don't have credit card? Don't have paypal? Still can help!

Tal vez no puedes colaborar pues no tienes una cuenta paypal, sin embargo, puedes hacer un depósito en una cuenta BCP/BBVA/Interbank/BcoNación, contáctanos a través de facebook para ello. Y siempre podrás también compartir nuestra campaña y pedirle a más gente que la difunda.

Maybe you can not collaborate because you do not have a paypal account, however, you can make a deposit in a bank account (BCP, BBVA, Interbank, Bco de la Nación), contact us via facebook to it.
And always you can also share our campaign and ask more people to forward it and support.

APERC, por sus siglas significa Asociación Peruana de Rough Collie. APERC, for its acronym means Peruvian Association of Rough Collie.

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone, my job is 'Professional Pastry Chef'. I do this job for 30 years, I love this job, when I create a dessert we put the soul. I want my every creation is unique ........ nice to see but mainly healthy, wholesome natural ingredients.The purpose of this campaign is to publish a cookbook which includes mainly Italian pastry recipes, but also pan-European, and a small extent of the world recipes.

In my over 30 years of experience behind the craft, since I was first taught by my nan first, and then my dad, how to even hold a pan, I have made an unquantifiable number of desserts, pastries, cakes of any sort and kind. I love creativity and exploring new tastes and flavours, experimenting new recipes using genuine products. The secret is in the simplicity of the ingredients: flour, water, milk, eggs and butter. My dream is to publish a cookbook, in about 500 pages, at least 250/300 recipes. (out of about 1500 recipes that I created, interpreted and calibrated in each dosages in these years of professional pastry chef). The cookbook will include ingredients, method of preparation and a photo of how the final product. I hope this campaign with your contribution make me reach my dream, I also hope to make everyone happy and remind me, when you eat a dessert done from my book.

Below products both raw and cooked (not yet completed the final preparation).

Below an example of the book 'The Art of Desserts'.

The cookbook will include a big variety of recipes, cakes, mousses, desserts and many others. The mission is to make the reader of that cookbook a great chef by following simple instructions and revealing some secrets. You can create any type of dessert for any event, birthday, breakfast, after dinner, with this recipe you can impress your friends with a dessert created by you like if you were a 'professional pastry chef'.

In the cookbook you will also find curiosities and variants of classic and well known recipes, such as the the croissants:

- Italian style Croissant
- French style Croissant
- Fagottino Cioccolato (Italian)
- Pain au chocolat (French)

Below are some pictures:

Below in the photo,( deleted part has been deliberately hidden ) is an example of how to create croissants inserting inside the butter to the dough in layers. Many products particularly for breakfast (Croissant, Fagottino, Croissant salty, etc.) can be frozen when they are not cooked, and you can cook them if necessary.

The same method of incorporation of the butter in layer is valid for 'Millefoglie'( Puff pastry)  but with different number of folds (you'll find out in the book), this procedure of folds is very important to have the true 'Millefoglie', light and friable,(another little secret), this it not the only secret.

In the book you will find all the information for this step of preparation, storage in the freezer (for preparation of large quantities) and cooking.
Similar products but different in taste, you are free to choose what to eat.
The cookbook will be printed on coated paper 110/115 g., hardcover, the size will be about 24cm x 20cm. (They can change the size, but not smaller of these).
The biggest challenge will be  to translate in the English language all such recipes, I need a long time, I have already contacted the professional translators for this job.
THE NAMES OF DESSERTS remain in the original language, Italian, French (Tiramisu, Croissant), in some cases where it is possible there will be an English translation. (for example for the ingredients: Italian language 'Mela',  English language 'Apple')

The units of measurement of the various ingredients, will be according to the standard: Kilogram, gram, liter, temperature C° (celsius).

There are no problems, in the stores can be purchased for $ 13/18 US dollars kitchen scales with the opportunity to weigh the ingredients in different units. (Kg. g.. oz. lb., Etc.). I wanted to convert the units of measurement to facilitate your work of preparation, but it is very complicated, there are too many recipes. I would need at least 1 year of work with a consequent delay in publication of the cookbook . I hope you can forgive me for this little problem.

Here's an example of some delights to prepare for you, for your children and for your friends.

This cookbook can also be useful to professionals around the world, chefs, pastry chefs. The recipes are all tested and calibrated, my customers are completely satisfied with my desserts, I hope for you is the same result.

I will try to make the right choice of 250/300 recipes, and I hope they will like it too you.

You like the Tiramisù? the Krapfen? The profiteroles with fruit?  Saint Honoré with choco Chantilly? Strudel with 'Apple and Pine nuts'?  'Millevoglie' with exotic fruits?................ no problem, in the book there will be.

This is a delicious crepe with cherry jam and cereal, you can also do with Nutella and banana, and many other variants. Can also be done savory with 'Mozzarella and Prosciutto', 'Stracchino and Rucola', or other variants, to make a snack or for dinner.

You will also find Savory Pastries for your party, anniversaries, or just to stay with family or friends and drink some beer, or a glass of fine wine.

If during the campaign you want to ask me a recipe for a dessert that you like please contact me and I'll try to put it in the cookbook of course if the recipe is my availability in about 1500 that I know.

It's easy as pie.

Macarons Colorful and Multi flavor (vanilla, cherry, strawberry, banana), cookies smile with Nutella, Croissants and more ( included in the book ).


What We Need & What You Get

The book will be released in two versions:
Book Printed version 'The Art of Desserts' Hardcover
ebook 'The Art of Desserts' (electronic digital version), ePub-PDF-Mobi.

Who contributes to the hardcover version, will also have included ebook version.

The book ' The Art of Desserts' will have about 250/300 images in full color, so you have no problem recreating your dessert as in the corresponding recipe.


The Impact

For the success of the project your contribution is important, if you like being creative in the kitchen, suggest to your clients new desserts or you like to practice the hobby of pastry chef, this book is for you, selecting the perk for the version that interests you to contribute to realize my project.

I also added a perk of thanks with a small amount of 3 EUR or 12 EUR, for this perks you are entitled to 5 or 18 recipes in PDF format, (Earlier publication as December 2015)  and you can then evaluate whether to buy the book when it is published. The 3 EUR or 12 EUR already donated will be discounted from the price of the book to any version purchased ( Hardcover or ebook digital).

The sale (Printed Version) will be exclusively by me, will not be a book that you will find on the market, I decided to make this choice to have the exclusive of my recipes. If the project is successful, then everyone can purchase it from my website.

I do not want to be a writer or publisher, I just want to realize the dream of publishing a personal cookbook and share it with those who like the art of desserts.

If the campaign reaches the goal, it will build a website with the purchase 'The Art of Desserts' directly from me.

If you have requests for translations 'The Art of Desserts' into other languages (Spanish, French or other) I can ask the translators. I can add a perk on its language. But I state that I first have to assess the costs of translation, which are very high.

Risks & Challenges

My wish is to make you appreciate my dessert even if you are very far from Italy.
When a customer, whether Italian or of another nationality on holiday in Italy makes me compliments for my dessert, I am very happy, this means that my work is done well.

I have chosen to print the book and ebook not far from me, to personally control the work done, so that the end result is excellent, and you can appreciate even more my recipes.

If the campaign reach the goal, the website that will be activated, there will be the opportunity to talk to me to ask questions on any issue of preparation or advice on ingredients to be used for preparation. But do not worry, the book is very detailed and easy to understand.

If you made a contribution and the campaign does not reach the goal, do not worry, your money will automatically be refunded.

For any request please contact me on the campaign and I'll reply as soon as possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

If any of you can not to contribute, it can help to reach the goal to share this campaign with the tools of sharing Indiegogo with your family or your friends.

Let me remind you that 'The Art of Desserts' will only be published if it is successfully funded through this Indiegogo campaign.

Thanks to Everyone and........ Buon Appetito!!!

The Teddy bear 'BIBO' (pictured below) is included in the book to make happy all the children of the world.

On your copy of the book will be my personal THANKS with your Name.

story:
"Terry and Lorna's Pitter-Puttering New Car"

An Introduction to the Children's Book project.

                Hello, this is Paul O'Moore of the band Coconut Milk, we are an indie-rock band with a good attitude, and radiate positivity where ever possible.  I am 27 years old, and I have extensive background and experience in the field of music, marketing, and entertainment.  I am also the oldest of 7 siblings, so it would be easy to say that I have a lot of experience with children.   Earlier this year I had the idea to write a Children's Book, when I first told my peers that I was interested in writing a book, most of them just shrugged it off, until I presented a full 24 page Hard Cover prototype of my book.  I had written a lot in the past, and always been generally well received, but the first reactions that the book garnered from random test marketing at the Cincinnati Public Library were overwhelmingly positive like nothing I had seen before.   The idea was inspired by our main source of artistic imagery Chris Baker.  Chris is an artist who spends a lot of time and passion doodling fun images reminiscent of the works of Dr. Seuss.   The book will also feature a CD in the back cover, and this CD will contain Slow Songs and Lullabies recorded by the individual members of Coconut Milk.   I originally intended on crafting and binding these books myself,  but then we were featured on Local 12 News on Mother's Day with the prototype copy that I had prepared.  Now the interest in the book is soaring, and I have to admit that I could use some help in order to ensure that we meet the demand.  

If my goals are met, I will be able to outsource the publishing and printing of this book through professional companies who can help me to distribute the book across the country.  I would like to see copies of this book in Libraries, Bookstores, and being read by Children everywhere, but I need your help!



What We Need & What You Get

The various publishing deals that I have found on the internet range from $500 for a short run of about 100 hardcopy books, up to $5,000 for full publishing and distributions of 2500 copies.   I intend to work with whatever I can bring in on here to maximize the amount of product that I can produce with your funding. %100 of all funds brought in through this campaign will go towards pressing as many copies of the book as possible.

Of course I am not going to ask you to give me something for nothing, so here is a breakdown of what I can offer you!

$5 will get you a free Digital Download of all of the currently released Coconut Milk songs,  that is 11 songs for $5!  Literally %50 cheaper than ordering the tracks from our bandcamp page.

$10 will get you your choice of a physical copy of either "Tastes Great!" or the "We're Sorry" EP's delivered to your door, as well as the digital download perk listed above.

$25 will get you a Pre-Order of the hardcover book "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car".  As well as one physical EP, and the digital downloads listed above. 

$50 will get you a 18 x 24 inch poster of Chris Baker's Artwork, signed by the member's of Coconut Milk, a Pre-Order of "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car". As well as BOTH physical EP's, and the digital downloads listed above. 

$100 will get you a special thank you shout out in the printed book, an 18 x 24 inch poster of Chris Baker's Artwork, signed by the member's of Coconut Milk, a Pre-Order of "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car". As well as BOTH physical EP's, and the digital downloads listed above. 

$250 will get you an original piece of art signed by Chris Baker,  a special thank you shout out in the printed book, an 18 x 24 inch poster of Chris Baker's Artwork, signed by the member's of Coconut Milk, a Pre-Order of "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car". As well as BOTH physical EP's, and the digital downloads listed above. 

$500 Coconut Milk will perform at your house party/venue, local to Cincinnati OH, an original piece of art signed by Chris Baker,  a special thank you shout out in the printed book, an 18 x 24 inch poster of Chris Baker's Artwork, signed by the member's of Coconut Milk, a Pre-Order of "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car". As well as BOTH physical EP's, and the digital downloads listed above.

$1500 - SERIOUSLY THOUGH, COCONUT MILK WILL TRAVEL TO YOU AND PERFORM A PRIVATE SET FOR YOU AND YOUR FRIENDS,  ANYWHERE IN THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES! You will also receive an original piece of art signed by Chris Baker,  a special thank you shout out in the printed book, an 18 x 24 inch poster of Chris Baker's Artwork, signed by the member's of Coconut Milk, a Pre-Order of "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car". As well as BOTH physical EP's, and the digital downloads listed above.  We will even throw in 10 additional copies of the book for you to share with your friends!

If for any reason we do not meet our goal, we will put %100 of the proceeds brought in from this campaign towards getting as many books pressed as possible.  Let's hypothetically say that we can raise $500.  Then we can press 100 copies of the book.  If we raise less than $500, then I can match it with my own investment to get at least 100 books pressed.  

The Impact

If you contribute to this project you are saying that you believe in supporting the children of the world, by helping us to offer them a bedtime story full of morals and values.  The book does this, while simultaneously maintaining a whimsical narrative to keep the child's interest.

  • This book is a Trans-Media piece of work that could be utilized in Art/Music Therapy settings.  It tells a charming story of Terry and Lorna a married couple who wants nothing more than to travel the world together.   So Terry takes it upon himself to build the most fantastic car, teaching children a sense of Can-Do attitude, and motivation to follow their dreams.  There are points in the story where Terry fails, and learns that Lorna will support him even though he has failed so he doesn't need to fear it.
  • I have always been one to stand by my word, and my work has spoke for it's self.  I have two larger scale music festivals under my belt, and have proven myself to be resourceful and honest in my support of the Cincinnati Music Scene.  Coconut Milk has not even been a band for 1 year yet, and already we have 2 EP's recorded under our belt.  Productivity has never quite been an issue for us as a band, and if our product's benefit people in general whether it be making them feel good, or helping them put their kids to bed, that is what makes us happy. 

Risks & Challenges

There are possible bumps in the road ahead of us, some of the band members already have their songs recorded for the Slow Songs and Lullabies CD, and some of us don't currently have them recorded.   We are also running into the issue of time, some of the fastest turn around times that I have seen run about a 7-10 day turn around time, before the finished hard-copy books arrive at my house.  We are trying to release this book on June 12th at Fountain Square in Cincinnati, even if it is just a small run.

  • I spend my professional life meeting deadlines in my current profession as a Booking Manager for Maudie's here in Cincinnati.  Also the band Coconut Milk has been excellent at achieving any goals or deadlines that have been set out for us, we show this by the fact that we have released 2 EP's, gone on an East Coast Tour, and have appeared on Local 12 "Good Morning Cincinnati" all within less then a year of the band's inception.  All of these accomplishments from the band end of things have come while I simultaneously threw the extremely successful "Zines, Screens, and, Screams Festival", and booking at least 28 shows a month at Maudies.  
  • Long story short, I welcome a challenge.
  • With your funding, I can expedite the printing and publishing of the book, if this campaign is very successful, I will also be able to allocate some funds towards some studio time for the Slow Songs and Lullabies CD.  If we can spend some money on studio time, then the recordings should sound a lot better, otherwise we will have to record simple songs ourselves in order to meet the deadlines.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a contribution, we understand that times can be hard and not everyone is "Made of money", but if you believe in our cause, please share this campaign with your friends and family to let them know that we are going through with this.  If you are a fan of the band Coconut Milk, tell them that one of your favorite bands is trying to do something cool for the kids. Link it up in your social media sites, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, etc. We need this book idea to reach as far as possible in order for this campaign to be successful, and we can't do it with out your help!

"Terry and Lorna's Pitter-Puttering New Car"
An Introduction to the Children's Book project.
                Hello, this is Paul O'Moore of the band Coconut Milk, we are an indie-rock band with a good attitude, and radiate positivity where ever possible.  I am 27 years old, and I have extensive background and experience in the field of music, marketing, and entertainment.  I am also the oldest of 7 siblings, so it would be easy to say that I have a lot of experience with children.   Earlier this year I had the idea to write a Children's Book, when I first told my peers that I was interested in writing a book, most of them just shrugged it off, until I presented a full 24 page Hard Cover prototype of my book.  I had written a lot in the past, and always been generally well received, but the first reactions that the book garnered from random test marketing at the Cincinnati Public Library were overwhelmingly positive like nothing I had seen before.   The idea was inspired by our main source of artistic imagery Chris Baker.  Chris is an artist who spends a lot of time and passion doodling fun images reminiscent of the works of Dr. Seuss.   The book will also feature a CD in the back cover, and this CD will contain Slow Songs and Lullabies recorded by the individual members of Coconut Milk.   I originally intended on crafting and binding these books myself,  but then we were featured on Local 12 News on Mother's Day with the prototype copy that I had prepared.  Now the interest in the book is soaring, and I have to admit that I could use some help in order to ensure that we meet the demand.  
If my goals are met, I will be able to outsource the publishing and printing of this book through professional companies who can help me to distribute the book across the country.  I would like to see copies of this book in Libraries, Bookstores, and being read by Children everywhere, but I need your help!

   What We Need & What You Get The various publishing deals that I have found on the internet range from $500 for a short run of about 100 hardcopy books, up to $5,000 for full publishing and distributions of 2500 copies.   I intend to work with whatever I can bring in on here to maximize the amount of product that I can produce with your funding. %100 of all funds brought in through this campaign will go towards pressing as many copies of the book as possible.
Of course I am not going to ask you to give me something for nothing, so here is a breakdown of what I can offer you!
$5 will get you a free Digital Download of all of the currently released Coconut Milk songs,  that is 11 songs for $5!  Literally %50 cheaper than ordering the tracks from our bandcamp page.
$10 will get you your choice of a physical copy of either "Tastes Great!" or the "We're Sorry" EP's delivered to your door, as well as the digital download perk listed above.
$25 will get you a Pre-Order of the hardcover book "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car".  As well as one physical EP, and the digital downloads listed above. 
$50 will get you a 18 x 24 inch poster of Chris Baker's Artwork, signed by the member's of Coconut Milk, a Pre-Order of "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car". As well as BOTH physical EP's, and the digital downloads listed above. 
$100 will get you a special thank you shout out in the printed book, an 18 x 24 inch poster of Chris Baker's Artwork, signed by the member's of Coconut Milk, a Pre-Order of "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car". As well as BOTH physical EP's, and the digital downloads listed above. 
$250 will get you an original piece of art signed by Chris Baker,  a special thank you shout out in the printed book, an 18 x 24 inch poster of Chris Baker's Artwork, signed by the member's of Coconut Milk, a Pre-Order of "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car". As well as BOTH physical EP's, and the digital downloads listed above. 
$500 Coconut Milk will perform at your house party/venue, local to Cincinnati OH, an original piece of art signed by Chris Baker,  a special thank you shout out in the printed book, an 18 x 24 inch poster of Chris Baker's Artwork, signed by the member's of Coconut Milk, a Pre-Order of "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car". As well as BOTH physical EP's, and the digital downloads listed above.
$1500 - SERIOUSLY THOUGH, COCONUT MILK WILL TRAVEL TO YOU AND PERFORM A PRIVATE SET FOR YOU AND YOUR FRIENDS,  ANYWHERE IN THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES! You will also receive an original piece of art signed by Chris Baker,  a special thank you shout out in the printed book, an 18 x 24 inch poster of Chris Baker's Artwork, signed by the member's of Coconut Milk, a Pre-Order of "Terry and Lorna's Pitter Puttering New Car". As well as BOTH physical EP's, and the digital downloads listed above.  We will even throw in 10 additional copies of the book for you to share with your friends!
If for any reason we do not meet our goal, we will put %100 of the proceeds brought in from this campaign towards getting as many books pressed as possible.  Let's hypothetically say that we can raise $500.  Then we can press 100 copies of the book.  If we raise less than $500, then I can match it with my own investment to get at least 100 books pressed.     The Impact If you contribute to this project you are saying that you believe in supporting the children of the world, by helping us to offer them a bedtime story full of morals and values.  The book does this, while simultaneously maintaining a whimsical narrative to keep the child's interest.

story:
What is The Crossover Alliance?

Have you ever wanted to write or read a piece of speculative fiction that not only included Christian themes but real-world content? It used to be hard to find, thanks to the narrow rules defined by the publishing industry. The Christian market can be unkind to pieces with edgy content, arguing that such material has no place in Christ-centered fiction. And most secular markets are not always welcoming to speculative pieces containing Christian content, basing their decision on the stereotypical 'Rated-G' Christian pieces that have come out over the years.

That's why The Crossover Alliance was created.

The Crossover Alliance is an online publishing company built around edgy Christian speculative fiction - in general terms, Christ-centered speculative fiction with edgy content, such as sexual themes, language, drug use, or violence. The term 'edgy' not only encompasses content though - it can also be applied to certain situations/themes/character deficiencies that are not typically found or ‘allowed’ in Christian fiction. This unique genre crosses the line of both secular fiction and Christian fiction and creates a new breed - not just to appeal to a wider audience, but also to shed light on realistic, entertaining writing that has the power to appeal to both Christians and non-Christians alike.

We're opening our doors soon, and we need help raising funds to support the fiction catalog for our first year, which will include at the very least, six fiction books.

By supporting The Crossover Alliance, you'll be able to snag some awesome subscriptions to our publishing catalog.

Who is The Crossover Alliance?

The Crossover Alliance was originally launched as an online community in 2012 by me, David N. Alderman, an author who has been self-publishing edgy Christian speculative fiction for over ten years. My novel series - Black Earth - sparked off interest in edgy Christian speculative fiction by merging apocalyptic fiction with Christian themes and real-world content. Since crossing the boundaries of Christian and secular fiction, a plethora of other authors came out of the woodwork, all specializing in this unique blend of fiction.

Since 2012, The Crossover Alliance has gone from an online community idea to a website to - now - an online publishing company to help support authors and satisfy readers of edgy Christian speculative fiction.

A diverse team of individuals have gathered together to help support the forming of The Crossover Alliance, including:

David N. Alderman

Founder and Operator of The Crossover Alliance, and full-time author who finished writing his first full-length novel at the age of sixteen. Since then, David has self-published seven novels, a novella, a non-fiction piece, and numerous short stories and flash fiction pieces. In his spare time he enjoys video gaming. You can find David's blog and website at http://www.davidnalderman.com.

Mark Carver

Mark Carver is the author of The Age of Apollyon Trilogy, the short story series The Jerusalem Chronicles, Indelible, and Cyn. His next novel, Beast, will be released soon through The Crossover Alliance. Besides writing, he is passionate about art, tattoos, heavy metal music, and medieval architecture. After living in China for more than eight years, Mark now lives in Atlanta, GA with his wife and two children.

You can find Mark online at www.markcarverbooks.com and on Facebook at www.facebook.com/markcarverbooks.

Nathan James Norman

Husband. Father. Pastor.

Storyteller. Reader. Comic Fan.

Slave of the Lord Jesus Christ.

Nathan James Norman blogs at www.nathanjamesnorman.com, hosts a speculative fiction podcast on www.untoldpodcast.com, and preaches at the Orchard Church in Traverse City, Michigan—www.orchardchurch.net.

Jess Hanna

Jess Hanna is a best-selling author of supernatural thrillers that explore spiritual themes, including Adverse Possession (which will soon be published through The Crossover Alliance) and The Road to Hell. Jess's stories intrigue and entertain while tirelessly pursuing the truth. He lives in Grand Rapids, MI with his wife and currently works in the publishing industry. He is also a devoted follower of Jesus Christ.

You can find out more about Jess at his official website, www.jesshanna.com.

Peter Younghusband

Married, mid 50s, father of 2 adult daughters, Registered Nurse living in Melbourne, Australia. Peter has been an avid reader since Primary School. Since becoming a Christian in his twenties, he discovered Christian fiction and was hooked with the diversity of genre and how Christian authors contribute in their own unique way through their imagination, writing style, creativity, genre and guidance from God.

Reading Christian fiction, Peter has come to love the genres of spiritual warfare, military, science fiction, fantasy, mystery and suspense, time travel, edgy speculative Christian fiction, and the supernatural from a Christian/biblical worldview. Reviewing books in these genres has led Peter to create his own blog where he showcases Christian authors and their craft, and encourage readers to consider their books.

Check out Peter’s blog at christianfictionreviewguru.blogspot.com.au.

What is the $1,500 for exactly?

We are asking for $1,500 to cover marketing, cover design, and various other business expenses for our first year's catalog.

Your First Year's Catalog?

Our fiction catalog this first year will consist of at least six books which will include our short story Anthologies, novels from the Alliance community, and new outside submissions wanting to add their books to our eclectic lineup. We say at least six books, because that's the minimum we plan on publishing each year. This first year, we know we'll have more than six books to put out because we have a handful of authors who are publishing new editions of their previously published books through The Crossover Alliance.

The tentative lineup that we already have for the later half of 2015 includes:

Black Earth: End of the Innocence



On the evening of his high school graduation, Nathan Pierce - plagued with visions of an immortal girl intent on killing herself - collapses on stage. When he awakens and is confronted by a blue-eyed stranger, he is left wondering if his mental instability is a consequence of the head wound he incurred in a deadly car accident days earlier.

Heather Rhodes, wracked with guilt because of the death of a newborn in a fatal car wreck, finds herself questioning her own spiritual beliefs. Unable to come to terms with the strange gift she used to protect her and Nathan in the accident, Heather wonders if it was simply a figment of her imagination.

Cynthia Ruin, aka The Pink Rabbit - school prostitute, decides that her high school graduation night would be better spent partying instead of spending time with friends and family. At a nightclub in Scottsdale, Cynthia finds more than she bargained for when a stranger from her past decides to exact his revenge on her for a prior rejection.

When hundreds of meteorites start falling from the sky, Nathan, Heather and Cynthia all come to realize that their problems are nothing compared to the global crisis. While the nations scramble to position themselves amidst the terror, the President of the United States makes it her personal mission to keep the country on the right track to becoming a world superpower, while a hostile entity known only as Absolute threatens her administration.

And then word spreads that the falling meteorites may not be meteorites at all....

Beast

MFEC-19, aka "The Beast," is an offshore oil platform behemoth in the Pacific Northwest. Kyle Hamilton, an experienced derrickhand who has survived a brush with death, is its newest resident. Forced back into the drilling world to pay for his wife's cancer treatment, Kyle is thrilled and terrified to be part of the team that keeps the monster in check.

But the Beast bows to no man.

One slip, one mistake, and hell breaks loose above the storm-swept water. Kyle and his crew find themselves in the fiery jaws of death as the Beast thrashes itself apart, unleashing an industrial cataclysm unlike anything the world has ever seen. Using his quick wits, hoping for good luck, and praying for a miracle, Kyle tries desperately to save himself and those around him, but the will to survive comes with heavy costs.

And the Beast will show no mercy.

Adverse Possession

The Forresters have found their dream home… So has something else. After years of moving from place to place, Andy and Tess are ready to settle down. But from the day they moved into the sprawling Victorian house, something just wasn't right. The power cuts out twice a day on a fixed schedule. Windows unlock and open on their own. Strange scratching sounds come from behind the walls. As the bizarre occurrences continue to increase in frequency and strength, the true source of the extraordinary activity is revealed. What started as an enchanting curiosity has become a danger to them all, and the Forresters are in a race against time to save their family from an enemy unlike anything they have ever known.

The Crossover Alliance Anthology - Volume 1

This anthology was originally published in 2014 - before the Crossover Alliance was a publishing company unto itself - and is being re-branded under the company banner. This anthology contains nine unique stories of speculative fiction, all with Christ-centered themes that may or may not be obvious to the reader. This is the perfect 'sampler' to really get a taste of the type of fiction that The Crossover Alliance will be publishing in the future.

What are the rewards?

Pledge $5 and receive a thank you on social media, The Crossover Alliance website, and a special ecard to thank you for your invaluable support!

Pledge $15 and receive the previous rewards PLUS a digital copy of the first volume of our upcoming anthology.

Pledge $25 and receive the $5 reward tier thank you, PLUS a digital copy of both of our upcoming anthologies – Volumes 1 & 2.

Pledge $50  and receive a special digital subscription to our entire first year's catalog of published books – including both of our upcoming anthologies.

Pledge $100 and receive a special digital subscription to our entire first year’s catalog of published books – including both of our upcoming anthologies, PLUS an additional digital subscription to give to a friend.

Pledge $250  or more and receive a special digital subscription to our entire first year’s catalog of published books – including both of our upcoming anthologies, PLUS two additional digital subscription to give to a friend.

*All digital rewards will be sent out two-weeks before their official publication dates.*

Risks and challenges

The Crossover Alliance will work hard to meet every deadline we announce to the public. That being said, as a publishing company, hiccups are imminent, including delayed publishing deadlines and issues with our website or production schedule. As far as Indiegogo campaign rewards are concerned, any and everything can happen - Murphy's Law, right?

Clear communication and absolute transparency are the two most important things that we can control. When a deadline is looming and we're behind the 8-ball? We'll tell you why, and we'll do our best to rectify the situation, even if it requires some all-nighters behind the computer screen or on the telephone to get things moving in the right direction again.

As a publishing company - and a Christian publishing company no less - we want to make sure we deliver honesty and integrity along with our edgy Christian speculative fiction novels.

story:
A bit about me...

My name is Ryan Baptiste and I am a Certified Addictions Counsellor.  Not only do I talk the talk, I have walked the walk, both through addiction and Mental Health Struggles, I have been down so low that I have seen only one way out, but I have battled my way out and am on a steady climb to the top.  By writing this book I want to share the struggles and triumphs with the world.  I have been to the bottom, I have been in the foster care system, I have almost taken my life, but each dip to the bottom I pick myself up, dust myself off and become stronger for having experienced that low.  Your contributions mean so much to me, from $.01 to $100 and everything in between puts me one step closer to achieving this goal!  If this story can help one person realize they are not alone, to me, it is worth it.


    What I Need...

     Publishing isn't cheap, and I am not perfect.  ALL of the money raised is going directly to the publishing, editing and copyrighting of this book.  ALL OF IT!

    None of the money raised will be used for personal reasons, or squandered away.

    Every perk offered, comes from my pocket, and my heart, Every contributor will get a sincere thank you.
    If I do not reach my funding goal the funds will be put into a savings account where I will contribute my own money when I am able to complete the funding for the project.  If I go over the funding goal, the excess money raised will be divided between Team in Training, a Cancer charity that strives to cure the Cancer that took my Foster Mother and Mood Disorder clinic at Toronto Western hospital.

    Your Impact

    Your contribution of your hard-earned money means the world to me.  You are allowing me to share my story on a scale larger than I could have ever imagined.  You contribute with the knowledge that you are allowing me to share this story with someone who may be struggling.  Someone who may be going through a hard time and needs to know they are not alone.

    Risks & Challenges

    I work literally seven days a week to provide for my family.  This manuscript is written once my daughter goes to bed at night or my wife falls asleep, there will be challenges some nights to work the manuscript,  I have run into many obstacles in my life and have overcome them all, just as I will this one.  This story will be shared with the world.  I have vacation time coming up that will be dedicated solely to this project.

      If you can't donate...

      Some of you cannot contribute, but your help is still important to me, spread the word, share the campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram even LinkedIn.  Word of Mouth helps immensely

story:
I am publishing my book The ART of Being Successful and preselling books to cover the setup and first run printing cost.

[From back cover]

For 30 years of my life I was tired and frustrated. I would start a project with the greatest of enthusiasm, determined to make it became the success I desired. However, just like clock work, reality would set in and I was right back in the place I was before. Struggling to make my life work the way I desired. I then started on a journey, determined to understand what I was doing wrong and what I specifically needed to do in order to reach the level of success I desired. 

My journey took me from business books, through spirituality, metaphysics and the law of attraction. I learned alternative medical techniques trying to make the changes I thought I needed. Over time, I was able to piece together a process I could follow and amazing things started to happen for me. I then worked on transferring my ideas to other people and I refined it into a process that is easy to follow and get's results. I call it The ART of Being Successful. 

In your hands, you hold a handbook to implement this process in your life. If you will take the time to read, learn and implement what is in this book, you will experience great changes in your life.

You will learn....

- 2 simple techniques to relieve stress in 30 seconds

- How you created your belief system and a simple way to change it

- How an atom holds the secret to the life you desire

- Why positive thinking is only scratching the surface

- How to finally be free of the fears that are limiting you

- The routine I use everyday to create the life I desire

A donation of $20 gets you a copy of the book shipped to you as soon as they are printed.

A donation of $30 gets you a signed copy of the book shipped to you as soon as they are printed.

The book is scheduled to be available April 30th  

Thank you for your pre order of The ART pf Being Successful and I wish you and your family all the best.

story:
...

My name is Filaretos Psimmenos. Ten years ago, together with my wife, Marianna, we created AMANITA Guesthouse on Pelion. Pelion is a mountainous peninsula in central Greece, washed by the Aegean Sea. It is a unique corner of Greece, unspoiled from mass-tourism. Our guesthouse is situated in the village of Tsagarada, on the eastern slopes of the mountain in a truly privileged location between mountain and sea.

AMANITA Guesthouse is the ideal destination for relaxation and detoxification from the hectic modern life-style. Our aim is to offer to our guests a real “Mt. Pelion experience”, by putting them in touch with local history, gastronomy and culture.

The buildings of the guesthouse are surrounded by a large organic garden. Our guests have easy access to some of the most beautiful beaches of the Aegean and may join our walking tours to collect wild herbs, sprouts and mushrooms, as well as our kitchen lessons and workshops about the use of herbs for culinary and medicinal purposes. Our famous breakfast makes use of organic fruit and vegetable from our garden as well as products of small local producers. 

...

Γεια σας είμαι ο Φιλάρετος Ψημμένος. Με τη γυναίκα μου τη Μαριάννα πριν 10 χρόνια δημιουργήσαμε τον Ξενώνα ‘ΑΜΑΝΙΤΑ’, στο Πήλιο. Ο ξενώνας βρίσκεται στην  Τσαγκαράδα, σε μια προνομιακή τοποθεσία, μεταξύ βουνού και θάλασσας, με βαθύσκια δέντρα, πλούσιες πηγές νερού και σμαραγδένιες παραλίες.

Ο Ξενώνας ΑΜΑΝΙΤΑ αποτελεί ιδανικό προορισμό  για ξεκούραση και αποτοξίνωση από τους ρυθμούς της σύγχρονης ζωής, σε περιβάλλον υψηλής αισθητικής με ζεστή ατμόσφαιρα και προσωπική φροντίδα. Τα κτήρια του ξενώνα βρίσκονται μέσα σε ένα βιολογικά καλλιεργούμενο κτήμα, που περιλαμβάνει κήπο με βότανα, οπωρώνα και βιολογικό περιβόλι. Οι φιλοξενούμενοι μας έχουν εύκολη πρόσβαση σε μερικές από τις ομορφότερες παραλίες του Αιγαίου, και μπορούν να πάρουν μέρος μαζί μας σε  θεματικές δραστηριότητες στη φύση με γαστρονομική κατάληξη, όπως πεζοπορίες, περιπάτους, συλλογή καρπών και άγριων βοτάνων, κυνήγι μανιταριών ή σε μαθήματα μαγειρικής και εργαστήρια σχετικά με τα Πηλιορείτικα βότανα και τη χρήση τους στη θεραπεία και την κουζίνα. Το βραβευμένο πρωινό μας αξιοποιεί τα βιολογικά λαχανικά και φρούτα από το περιβόλι μας και τα προϊόντα μικρών τοπικών παραγωγών.

The project

For more than 10 years now, we make efforts to reveal and creatively use the culinary culture of our area. During this journey we collected lots of information, recipes, experiences and stories that we happily share with our guests. It was their enthusiasm about this material that inspired us to write it down. They helped us realize, that it is much more than just a bunch of recipes. It is about preserving culinary culture, paying tribute to our families’ story, looking at the ways people in the area survived and developed relying on locally available resources. We created a book of 150 pages titled “The culinary curiosity of a hotelier” with 34 stories and 63 recipes, combining past and present, mountain and sea, the vegetable and the herb garden and ending up around a table full of goodies in our courtyard – like every greek feast does. Today we are reaching out to you, so that we may publish this book, in two versions – a greek and an English one. Help us preserve the culinary heritage of our region and share the experience of living in this unique place with people all over the world.

...

Εδώ και πάνω από 10 χρόνια που λειτουργεί ο ξενώνας, προσπαθούμε να ανακαλύψουμε και να αναδείξουμε δημιουργικά την τοπική γαστρονομία. Στο ταξίδι αυτό συλλέξαμε  πληροφορίες, συνταγές και ιστορίες, που μοιραζόμαστε με τους επισκέπτες μας. Το ενδιαφέρον και ο ενθουσιασμός τους για το υλικό αυτό, μας έδωσαν το έναυσμα να το καταγράψουμε. Χάρη σ’ αυτούς συνειδητοποιήσαμε, ότι  έχουμε στα χέρια μας κάτι πολύ παραπάνω από ένα μάτσο συνταγές. Κάποιες από τις ιστορίες έχουν δημοσιευτεί κατά καιρούς σε σχετικά sites και blogs. Συγκεντρώνοντας και δημοσιοποιώντας μέσω του βιβλίου το υλικό αυτό, βάζουμε ένα λιθαράκι στην προστασία της γαστρονομικής παράδοσης της περιοχής, τιμάμε την ιστορία των οικογενειών μας, δείχνουμε πώς οι άνθρωποι στα χρόνια της φτώχειας επιβίωσαν και εξελίχτηκαν, στηριζόμενοι σε ότι παράγονταν στον τόπο τους. Στις 150 σελίδες του βιβλίου με τίτλο ‘οι γαστρονομικές ανησυχίες ενός ξενοδόχου’ υπάρχουν 34 ιστορίες και 63 συνταγές, που ενώνουν το χτες και το σήμερα, το βουνό και τη θάλασσα, το περιβόλι και το βοτανόκηπο και τελειώνουν γύρω από ένα τραπέζι στην αυλή μας. Σήμερα ζητάμε τη βοήθεια σας, για να εκδώσουμε το βιβλίο αυτό σε δύο εκδόσεις – μια στα ελληνικά και μια στα αγγλικά. Θα μπορέσουμε έτσι να μεταφέρουμε την εμπειρία του Πηλίου, την εμπειρία ΑΜΑΝΙΤΑ, ένα ζωντανό κομμάτι της ελληνικής παραδοσιακής γαστρονομίας, σε ανθρώπους από όλο τον κόσμο.

Almost at the finish line!

The book has been completely written. The English translation of the greek manuscript is also ready. The book will be illustrated with drawing’s by our daughter Zoe, inspired by Pelion landscapes and views of the guesthouse, that are almost done. What is left is professional editing of the English text, pagination, the cover page design and printing.

...

Η συγγραφή του βιβλίου έχει ολοκληρωθεί, καθώς και η αγγλική μετάφραση. Έτοιμη σχεδόν είναι και η εικονογράφηση, με χειροποίητες ζωγραφιές της κόρης μας Ζωής, με θέματα από την περιοχή και τον ξενώνα.

Απομένει η επιμέλεια του αγγλικού κειμένου, η σελιδοποίηση, ο σχεδιασμός και η μακέτα του εξωφύλλου και η εκτύπωση.

Budget breakdown (Where the money will go)

  • Pagination, translation, professional line editing: 1100 Euros (apprx 1350 USD)
  • Illustration, design:   700 Euros (apprx 860 USD)
  • Printing 1000 copies of the Greek and 1000 copies of the English version (monochrome inside on samoua paper 100 gms and a four color cover on Velvet paper: 3200 Euros (apprx 3920 USD)
  • Platform fees, packaging and shipping expenses: 1000 Euros (apprx 1220 USD)
  • Total: 6000 Euros (apprx. 7350 USD)

Any money in excess of the goal will go towards printing the book inside using two colours.   If we miss our funding target we will print fewer copies, enough for all backers to receive their reward.

...

  • Για σελιδοποίηση, μετάφραση, επιμέλεια των κειμένων 1100 ευρώ
  • Για εικονογράφηση – σχεδιασμό και μακέτες 700 ευρώ
  • Για την εκτύπωση 1000 αντιγράφων της ελληνικής έκδοσης και 1000 αντιγράφων της αγγλικής έκδοσης. Μονοχρωμία εσωτερικά σε χαρτί Samoua 100 gsm και τετράχρωμο εξώφυλλο σε χαρτί Velvet με ματ πλαστικοποίηση.  3100 ευρώ
  • Για έξοδα χρήσης της πλατφόρμας, συσκευασία και αποστολή δώρων 1000 ευρώ.
  • Σύνολο 6.000 ευρώ (καθώς είμαστε από την πλατφόρμα αναγκασμένοι να ζητήσουμε USD, το συνολικό ποσό σε δολάρια με βάση την ισοτιμία της 27/2/18 είναι  7.350 USD) 

Αν συγκεντρωθούν περισσότερα χρήματα, θα δοθούν για να γίνει η εκτύπωση εσωτερικά δίχρωμη. Αν δεν πιάσουμε το στόχο που έχουμε βάλει, θα εκτυπώσουμε λιγότερα αντίτυπα από κάθε έκδοση ώστε όλοι οι δωρητές να λάβουν τα δώρα τους.

Timetable

  1. Campaign end: 28/4/2018
  2. Fulfillment Indiegogo: 18/5/2018
  3. Printing: 25/6/2018
  4. Packaging and Shipping: 30/7/2018

...

  1. Η καμπάνια μας τελειώνει στις 28/4/2018.
  2. Θα χρειαστούν άλλες 20 ημέρες για τη λογιστική εκκαθάριση από την Indiegogo και για τραπεζικές διατυπώσεις (18/5/2018).
  3. Η εκτύπωση του βιβλίου θα έχει γίνει μέχρι 25/6/2018.
  4. Για τη συσκευασία και την αποστολή των δώρων θα χρειαστούμε ένα επιπλέον μήνα (περίπου μέχρι 30/7/2018)

Spread the word!

Even if you can’t offer any money, there are ways to get involved and support us: Please tell your friends about this project. Share this campaign, using the share tools of the Platform (you will find them near the upper-right corner of this page). Or send our Indiegogo link to anyone you think could be interested in our project.

We would be grateful if we could realize this book with your help!   

...

Ακόμα και αν δεν έχετε τη δυνατότητα να συνεισφέρετε οικονομικά στην προσπάθεια μας, μπορείτε να μας βοηθήσετε πολύ ουσιαστικά να πραγματοποιήσουμε το όνειρό μας : Επικοινωνήστε αυτή την καμπάνια στους φίλους σας, τους συγγενείς, σε όσους περισσότερους ανθρώπους μπορείτε . Χρησιμοποιήστε τα εργαλεία που παρέχει η πλατφόρμα και αναρτήστε αυτό το link σε facebook, Twitter ή διαδώστε το μέσω e-mail.

Σας ευχαριστούμε πολύ για το χρόνο, το ενδιαφέρον σας και κάθε βοήθεια που μπορείτε να προσφέρετε. Η συμμετοχή σας έχει τη δύναμη να κάνει το όνειρο μας πραγματικότητα!

...

 

Βίντεο στα Ελληνικά

story:
Who are we?

We are all fashion students hoping to make the industry a better place through sustainability. We love working and creating with one another and supporting young people in the industry who aren't given a voice in mainstream magazines.

Since we're students we need help in raising the funds to keep a print and digital magazine alive. As well as covering costs for things like our shoots and equipment which is why we're reaching out to others for help.

Your contributions will help us run our print run of Issue #3 which has seen young creatives from all over the UK and the world contribute their ideas, photography, editing, designs and artwork to the magazine.

What We Need & What You Get

We're aiming to hit £1,000 in funding which will help us print around 200 copies of the magazine. This will allow us to bring our price point down so more people can afford the magazine. Plus, we'll be able to give a small selection of copies out to people in the fashion industry for free, to help us get our name out there.

If we don't reach out goal, we'll use the funding to print as many copies as we possibly can!

The Impact

Your contributions will help make a vital difference to our magazine. We want to take our magazine to the next stage and funding more print copies so more people can enjoy our work is a great way to spread the word about our magazine.

You'll be helping young people and students display their work to more and more people -- not only giving a voice to sustainability in general, but providing support to individuals who want to make a difference in their creations

Perks

We offer tiers of perks no matter your budget. From digital copies, to receiving every print copy we ever make -- we hope you'll enjoy the magazine when you contribute.

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow us on social media. Give our campaign a RT and a share!

@bareminimummag 

http://thebareminimummag.com

story:
Julie Presley's newest release, Nor Forsake

Here it is! Round 2 of the Nor Forsake Campaign, as requested by many of you who weren't able to give during round 1. Thank you, in advance for the many ways that you are supporting this project!

I'm so thankful you're here and ready to partner with me for my second book. While I've been working towards publishing Nor Forsake for the last two years, this book has been in my heart for much longer than that and I am so excited to finally launch it into the world where it belongs.

Nor Forsake is a story of the Lord's promises and redemption, healing in the midst of pain and chaos, and the surprises that He brings when we're least expecting them. This is not just a romance, but also a love story between God and His children. I can't wait for you to read it.

What We Need & What You Get

Self-publishing is a huge venture yet I continue to believe it is the best avenue for me to pursue at this time. Your help means the world to me. 

Costs include:

  • Basic self publishing fees (e-book, print books, member fees, etc.)
  • Editing, proofing, design work
  • Marketing and promotions
  • Indiegogo fees

Check out the side bar to the right to see the perks available to you for giving! 

The Impact

I'm continuing in my goal to reach women with a message of healing and freedom. The feedback on those topics from Stones of Remembrance was overwhelming and I've found that this is an amazing avenue to bring an understanding of what God wants for our lives in an unconventional way, through fiction.

Other Ways You Can Help

I am so thankful that you're here at all and if you are unable to give at this time the best way you can help me is by sharing this campaign on your social media feeds. Thank you so much for your support, I could not do any of this without you!

Also, going over and above our monetary goal is NOT a bad thing! There are always hidden costs and circumstances that arise and any extra funds raised will be allotted for those things and for future projects because, let's be honest, I have more than a few!

How to Stay Connected

Keep checking back here because as we reach certain points along the way, I'll be celebrating with excerpts, the cover reveal and other fun surprises!

Other ways to stay in the loop:

www.juliepresley.com

www.facebook.com/authorjuliepresley

www.twitter.com/jpresley48

story:
A Marines Daughter is a novel written by Al Hague about a Viet Nam Veteran Marine near the end of his tour of duty in life and he is about to face his darkest fears, regrets and scattered memories of his past life in Viet Nam and in the Corps. SGT Jon Milo was a hero but has no idea that anyone thinks he is and he certainly does not think of himself as one. Jon has held a secret for many years from his family, friends and especially his only daughter.

Sara is a successful attorney who has always been close to her father but has suspected that he has always been holding back. Her desire to know the secrets that make her Dad the man he is has been a part of her life since she was old enough to sense the mystery.

Sara is determined to help her best friend, her father, to find peace with his past and as a side benefit gain him the recognition he deserves. During this quest, she realizes she has been missing an important part of her own life but it is not too late to make changes for herself.

Her father is tired of struggling with his past and finally understands the time has come to confide in his "little girl".

This story about their struggles to get to the truth and come to grips with the past is intended to help non-veterans have a better understanding of what many Veterans who fought in Viet Nam have endured for so long.

It is also a look back at what created this Marine and certainly many others to be willing to do what his country asked of him and his feelings about that yesterday and today.

My background is my work as a writer for magazines for the past ten years, The idea for this story came from a couple of other Vet friends who faced similar circumstances in this story. I too am a Viet Nam Vet 100% disabled with medical issues that really have no bearing on this except my desire to point out to the world this as one example of the internal struggles so many Vets of my time still suffer from. Hopefully, the families of those vets can gain some insight as to the struggles many still are trying to work through. The second message of the story is to fathers and the importance of a healthy and close relationship with their daughters. I live in Phoenix AZ with my wife of 27 years. Retired from a business and writing career a few years ago, I enjoy the story writing process. 

Risks for this project is to reach a large audience which my professional marketing team will be responsible for. The obvious risk is perhaps readers may not care for the story but early reviews are extremely positive including by people who have no reason to be less than honest.

I am convinced the message is also valuable to today's returning veterans and for that reason, I will be donating  a portion of the proceeds of book sales to The American Legion Post 97 in San Tan Valley AZ and the local chapter of Viet Nam Veterans Association in Mesa AZ., two organizations devoted to helping Veterans both men and women from all wars. 

If this project is not for you please utilize the tools here to let others know about this project. 

It just might have an important message for them.

Perks

Any contribution over $50.00 will receive a signed copy of the novel A Marine's Daughter. Any donation of $20.00 or more will receive a copy of the novel as an E-Book. No shipping charges in the USA,

The purpose of this campaign is to allow Self-publishing which is the only way to retain all rights to the material.  The funds go to the actual printing, publishing, and distribution of the novel. It will be available on Amazon, Barnes, and Noble and local and chain bookstores. My marketing team will be arranging book signings and speaking engagements as well as all forms of social media.

The ebooks will be available on Kindle and many others. Because I am using professionals this project has a very solid chance to be successful.  I hope the message of this book will help many people who share a common history with the protagonist Sgt Jon Milo, USMC and his daughter Sara.

I appreciate your support on my project and I hope all who read this novel will enjoy the story. It is fiction and not based on any person or persons known to me. Both characters represent many people with common challenges. Any resemblance to real persons is purely coincidental.

Thank you,

Al Hague, Author
