story:
The most dangerous person in the world of cyber security, is the insider. In the world of global conflict, the insider is the most informative. I've created three new works of fiction that take the reader inside of these worlds, to points of view seldom experienced. Your contribution today will help me reach the market in July! 

  • Trade Bangkok, a novel, is the first read in the Trade Series. 
  • Trade Azerbaijan, a short read, sits between novels in the series. 
  • High-Rise Crew Dirty Money is the first book in the High-Rise Crew trilogy.
Releasing three major works of fiction at one time is possibly unique, certainly a challenge. I've been working for many years to prepare. The drive to bring these stories, these characters to life, is motivation to succeed. With your contributions, I will. 

The process

The writing is done. Thankfully, I don't need outside help for much of the marketing effort. Cover designs, book layouts, building and maintaining a web presence are all skills I've managed to collect over the years. The video at the top of the page was recorded by a great friend for free. I assembled the video in Premier to avoid the cost of a professional (I know. It shows.)

I understand marketing and the publishing business well enough to move forward, but there is no easy way around editing. Hiring competent editors is an unavoidable but necessary expense, and frankly, I just don't have the cash.

Other writers will relate to the need for a second, third and fourth set of eyes to point out substantive changes, hint at grammatical fixes and provide endless proofreading. I want all of that, can't yet afford it, here we are. This campaign is solely about resources for editing. Will these novels sell? I think so. Your contribution will help make the difference. 

Thanks in advance for your help. I'll personally thank you later through email, on the phone or in person, depending upon the perk you choose. 


The Trade series is inspired by the lives of real people, including subject matter experts in the arms trade and operatives trained for counterterrorism. Welcome to the world of global conflict. 

Trade Bangkok is written from the point of view of Tuck (Web) Webber, inspired by the life of Rod McKay, an international arms dealer with offices in the U.S. and Thailand. Through his connections I’ve interviewed retired Special Forces personnel, UAV test pilots and counterterrorism team members currently on the front lines in the Middle East. I am in contact with a counter-extremism think tank to verify assumptions applied to some of my characters. 

Trade novels explore the business side of managing conflict through the medium of compelling fiction. Stakes could not be higher in Trade Azerbaijan. Are weapons of mass destruction secured? Is the world at war? My characters imply what insiders say privately. You'll find that the pace and tone of the Trade Series builds with each installment, toward an amazing and unpredictable crescendo. Welcome to the trade.


The third piece of fiction launches the High-Rise Crew Trilogy. The arc of these novels show cyber crime from many perspectives, beginning with the street-level black hat novel, High-Rise Crew Dirty Money (95,000 words). Follow the nefarious activities of an unlikely Chicago-based crew as they evolve through common theft, identity theft, carding, and corporate phishing expeditions, leading to the big con. No novel of this type would be complete without unpredictable conflicts between characters, and the promise of big money. If you like Dirty Money, you'll love what comes next, High-Rise Crew Financial Insiders will be released early in 2017. It raises the curtain on corporate espionage, insider theft and the prospect of global organized cyber crime. 

Subject matter experts for this series include a certified security specialist for the Federal Reserve, a retired Secret Service cyber crime specialist, and a military expert. Endless research further informs the novels. 

About the cost and perks

It's difficult for me to ask others for help, especially this much money. I always think I can/should do it all myself, but honestly, I can't. 

Indiegogo.com suggests small realistic funding goals, perhaps divide the actual need into multiple campaigns with numbers that seem reasonable. Maybe I should have done that. $10,500 is a daunting number, but honestly, that is precisely what it's going to cost to get the editing done. 

Incentives designed to reward your contributions are listed elsewhere on the page. Know that you will have my lasting gratitude for everything you do to help, even if all you can do is contribute a small amount. Even small contributions are very important! Every one is like a vote, moving us closer to the top pages of Indidgogo.com. And don't forget. After you contribute, become an advocate. Encourage your friends to join us at a level they can easily afford. 

About Tim Brost

Like many writers, I rely on a rich open inner life to explore and explain what I see around me. I allow my characters to be who and what they are, aside from who I am. The goal is to let them roam freely without meddling mannerisms or authorial interference. As composite stand-ins for real people, they deserve to be read, to tell their stories, impart insight and to entertain. 

My work experience is varied and somewhat irrelevant. What is relevant is the reduction in cost some acquired skills bring to the project. I've been a Creative Director and Webmaster. I've served on web and social media teams for various high-profile organizations for many years. I've worked in a tech company. Among the most relevant positions, I managed the publishing division of a prominent dot org. 

In contrast with a rich marketing career, I have a degree in the study of Religion. I’m trained in, and for a time taught for a private organization called Advanced Tactical Reconnaissance. I also trained under a Zen master to be a teacher. I am not a teacher. Follow my spiritual path and you will simply arrive at impermanence and imperfection. Perhaps because of the breadth of seemingly conflicted avocations, I see the world differently than some. My own perspective inevitably, but with restraint, finds its way into the novels. 

The team

I'm working with one of the best editing teams available. Kevin Anderson and Associates is excited to begin the laborious task of polishing 210,000 words. These novels deserve the best and we've already started to give them the attention they deserve.

How to advocate

Please tell your friends, on FB, Twitter, Instagram, on the phone and across the table. Send out a link through SMS or email. Give me a shout out. Mention that you know a novelist who writes about international conflict and cyber crime. To be specific, you can:

  • Like authortimbrost on Facebook
  • Follow @authortimbrost on Twitter
  • Send acquaintances to TimBrost.com

And it's not just about the novels. I already share links and other resources to the research behind these works of fiction, on my web site. Dig into the material as deeply as you want. Over time I'll add much more, and curate the information. I may even include interviews of prominent subject matter experts, so stick with me through the campaign and beyond. 

As I'm fond of saying, "Here we go!"
story_txt:
The most dangerous person in the world of cyber security, is the insider. In the world of global conflict, the insider is the most informative. I've created three new works of fiction that take the reader inside of these worlds, to points of view seldom experienced. Your contribution today will help me reach the market in July! 

Trade Bangkok, a novel, is the first read in the Trade Series. 


Trade Azerbaijan, a short read, sits between novels in the series. 


High-Rise Crew Dirty Money is the first book in the High-Rise Crew trilogy.

Releasing three major works of fiction at one time is possibly unique, certainly a challenge. I've been working for many years to prepare. The drive to bring these stories, these characters to life, is motivation to succeed. With your contributions, I will. 
The process
The writing is done. Thankfully, I don't need outside help for much of the marketing effort. Cover designs, book layouts, building and maintaining a web presence are all skills I've managed to collect over the years. The video at the top of the page was recorded by a great friend for free. I assembled the video in Premier to avoid the cost of a professional (I know. It shows.)
I understand marketing and the publishing business well enough to move forward, but there is no easy way around editing. Hiring competent editors is an unavoidable but necessary expense, and frankly, I just don't have the cash.
Other writers will relate to the need for a second, third and fourth set of eyes to point out substantive changes, hint at grammatical fixes and provide endless proofreading. I want all of that, can't yet afford it, here we are. This campaign is solely about resources for editing. Will these novels sell? I think so. Your contribution will help make the difference. 
Thanks in advance for your help. I'll personally thank you later through email, on the phone or in person, depending upon the perk you choose. 

The Trade series is inspired by the lives of real people, including subject matter experts in the arms trade and operatives trained for counterterrorism. Welcome to the world of global conflict. Trade Bangkok is written from the point of view of Tuck (Web) Webber, inspired by the life of Rod McKay, an international arms
dealer with offices in the U.S. and Thailand. Through his connections I’ve interviewed retired Special Forces personnel, UAV test pilots and counterterrorism team
members currently on the front lines in the Middle East. I am in contact with a
counter-extremism think tank to verify assumptions applied to some of my characters. Trade novels explore the business side of managing conflict through
the medium of compelling fiction. Stakes could not be higher in Trade Azerbaijan. Are weapons of mass
destruction secured? Is the world at war? My characters imply what insiders say privately. You'll find that the pace and tone of the Trade Series builds with each installment, toward an amazing and unpredictable crescendo. Welcome to the trade.The third piece of fiction launches the High-Rise Crew Trilogy. The arc of these novels show cyber crime from many perspectives, beginning with the street-level black hat novel, High-Rise
Crew Dirty Money (95,000 words). Follow the nefarious activities of an
unlikely Chicago-based crew as they evolve through common theft, identity theft, carding, and corporate phishing expeditions, leading to the big con. No novel of this type would be complete without unpredictable conflicts between characters, and the promise of big money. If you like Dirty Money, you'll love what comes next, High-Rise Crew Financial Insiders will be released early in 2017. It raises the curtain on corporate espionage, insider theft and the prospect of global organized cyber crime. 

Subject matter experts for this series include a certified security specialist for the Federal Reserve, a retired Secret Service cyber crime specialist, and a military expert. Endless research further informs the novels. 
About the cost and perks
It's difficult for me to ask others for help, especially this much money. I always think I can/should do it all myself, but honestly, I can't. 
Indiegogo.com suggests small realistic funding goals, perhaps divide the actual need into multiple campaigns with numbers that seem reasonable. Maybe I should have done that. $10,500 is a daunting number, but honestly, that is precisely what it's going to cost to get the editing done. 
Incentives designed to reward your contributions are listed elsewhere on the page. Know that you will have my lasting gratitude for everything you do to help, even if all you can do is contribute a small amount. Even small contributions are very important! Every one is like a vote, moving us closer to the top pages of Indidgogo.com. And don't forget. After you contribute, become an advocate. Encourage your friends to join us at a level they can easily afford.

story:
About the Book

Borrowing its name from the 1996 album by Nas, It Was Written: Poetry Inspired by Hip-Hop is the latest book from indie publishers Minor Arcana Press. Jason McCall and PJ Williams have brought together over 50 poets for a cypher — and a conversation — with hip-hop and literature.

The poems and poets in this book are influenced by hip-hop not only as a genre of music but also as a force of life. Contributing poet Michael Mlekoday says, "Hip-hop isn’t a just a genre I appreciate; it’s a culture that has actively contributed to my sense of self — a way of seeing the world." It Was Written shows how modern poets have engaged with one of the most powerful cultural forces of our time.

"Hip-hop is dangerous because

hip-hop is unstoppable."

And it's not just a book of poetry; It Was Written is a conversation. The poets have also contributed over 30 writing prompts in the back of the book to encourage readers to pick up their own pen. "And the cypher never ends."

Get In on This

We are currently in the middle of the production stage of the project. Your contribution will pay for printing the book and helping to share it with the world. In order for us to do that, we'll need to raise $2,500. In return, here's what you'll get for your contribution:

  • $10 – e-Book
  • $25 – Print book
  • $50 – Print book and branded notebook
  • $100 – Custom curated hip-hop playlist (plus print book and notebook)
  • $250 – VIP food and drinks at the launch party (plus all of the above)

About Minor Arcana Press

Minor Arcana Press is a DIY, volunteer-run publishing house based in Seattle, WA. Our mission is to empower overlooked and outsider authors and artists through publication, publicity, and community (emphasis on community). We are artists, writers, and musicians. Being an all volunteer organization means that we rely on community support to bring our books into the world. 

Minor Arcana Press is a fiscally sponsored affiliate of Old Growth Northwest.

Share this page with friends to help us reach our goal

story:
Turning Dreams Into Realities

  Desdemona’s Dreams, Volume II: The Land of Mar

Hi, I'm Z.W. Mohr, published poet, and author of the series Desdemona's Dreams. I live in the city of New Orleans, a place fertile with inspiration.

13 years ago, while living in California, I began to write a poem about a little girl named Desdemona that can bring her dreams into the real world. I had no idea at the time how meaningful this story would become, nor how far it would take me. I started to realize that the story I was writing was as much about me, as it was about Desdemona. I wanted to bridge the gap between just dreaming about something, and actually making it real. The farther into her dream world I went, the closer I came to my own aspirations of being an author.

As Desdemona's imagination unlocked countless wonders, she stood up for what she believed in, and discovered who she really was, I was right there with her realizing the same things about myself. When I shared it with a close friend she brought it to my attention that this story has the chance to inspire other people in the same way that it did me. From there it was my personal quest to finish the story, find a talented illustrator, and release it as one giant book into the world. 

It took some years, but I finished the story, found Aaron Damon Porter, and then realized that for Desdemona's Dreams to become a reality, I needed to go back to the drawing board. As a massive poem, though beautiful, it was inaccessible to most readers, and that was the last thing I wanted my work to be. Aaron and I decided to break it up into volumes, and I've been converting the real world scenes into prose ever since. We published the first Volume, To Dream of Dancing, in February 2016, and have been overjoyed by the marvelous response it's received. Parents and children alike have been telling us how excited they are for another book in the series, and we have 14 more books to go.

 Aaron is going to be spending the Summer illustrating the next volume, and while he's creating beautiful images, I'll continue to edit, and fine tune the text. I'm in the process of editing The Land of Mar as I write this, and I can't wait to see what incredible artwork Aaron's going to come up with. We both want to put a series out that will inspire and nourish the minds of kids and adults alike, but we need your help to make that happen. 


What Your Funding Will Do

Our Goal Is $16,000
1.$9,000 goes towards the artwork (materials and time, supporting the illustrator as he  commits to this project full-time for 3 months.)

2.$3,000 will pay for a professional publicity campaign,
marketing, and entry fees for awards and festivals, so we can get the word out
to everyone about this book. Let's pave the way for the rest of the series!

3. $3,000 will pay for the first printing run of books, and for converting it into an E-book for tablets, kindles, computers and phones - the more access to our story, the better.

4. $1,000 will pay the paperwork fees - copyrighting, licensing renewal for our company, Desdemona’s Dreams L.L.C., etc. This segment will also pay the production costs for a first-run of artist prints of the original work from Volume II.

Tier 1: -  Monthly e-mail updates of our progress (including videos and photos)                -  Personalized thank you in the mail from us, the creators

Tier 2: -  Monthly e-mail updates of our progress (including videos and photos)                -  Personalized thank you in the mail from us, the creators                                          -  A signed print of original artwork from The Land of Mar

Tier 3: - Monthly e-mail updates of our progress (including videos and photos)                - Personalized thank you in the mail from us, the creators                                           - Signed print of original artwork from The Land of Mar                                                  - Signed copy of Desdemona's Dreams, Volume II: The Land of Mar.

Tier 4: - Monthly e-mail updates of our progress (including videos and photos)                 - Personalized thank you in the mail from us, the creators                                            - Signed copy of Desdemona's Dreams, Volume II: The Land of Mar.                        - Signed limited-edition 11x17 archival-print poster of the Volume I book                     release (only 14 of these available)

Tier 5: - Monthly e-mail updates of our progress (including videos and photos)                - Personalized thank you in the mail from us, the creators                                            - Signed copies of Desdemona’s Dreams Volume I and II                                               - Set of 5 large prints of the artwork from The Land of Mar, signed by the                  artist

Tier 6: - Monthly e-mail updates of our progress (including videos and photos)                 - Personalized thank you in the mail from us, the creators                                            - Signed copies Desdemona’s Dreams Volume I and II                                                   - Set of 5 large prints of the artwork from The Land of Mar, signed by                         the artist                                                                                                                                         - Your name in the acknowledgements page of The Land of Mar                                 - Original pen and ink sketch of characters from Volume II, by Aaron                           Damon Porter                                                                                                                              - Original poem tailored to your sketch, by Z.W. Mohr

Tier 7: - Monthly e-mail updates of our progress (including videos and photos)                - Personalized thank you in the mail from us, the creators                                             - Signed copies of Desdemona’s Dreams Volume I and II                                               - Your name in the acknowledgements page of The Land of Mar                                - Stretched-canvas giclee of original Volume II artwork(pronounced                            “gee-clay”, this is an archival print of such high quality, it can be                                 indistinguishable from an original painting)

Tier 8: - Monthly e-mail updates of our progress (including videos and photos)                - Personalized thank you in the mail from us, the creators                                             - Set of Volume II art greeting cards                                                                                        - Signed copies of Desdemona’s Dreams Volume I and II                                               - Your name in the acknowledgements page of The Land of Mar                                 - Original painting from the world of Desdemona’s Dreams, by Aaron                          Damon Porter                                                                                                                               - Original short-story tailored to your painting, by author Z.W. Mohr

The Impact

We’re creating a series that  teaches children the importance of their imagination, and how it can help them creatively solve problems. Desdemona brings her dreams into the real world, and we want the younger generations to realize that they can turn their dreams into realities too.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't afford to contribute we're happy you stopped
by to look at our page and read our story. We only ask that you share our page
with as many people as you can, use the Indiegogo share tools to make it easier,
post it on social media, or even e-mail your friends. Every little bit brings this dream one step closer to being brought into the real world, which could in turn spark imaginations, and build the confidence of so many great dreamers-in-waiting out there.

Thank you so much for your contributions to this project. Every bit really helps!

Don’t forget to send your e-mail address to us at info@desdemonasdreams.com

                                                 

Help bring inspiration and dreams to everyone!

world of Desdemona’s Dreams, by Aaron                          Damon Porter                                                                                                                               - Original short-story
tailored to your painting, by author Z.W. Mohr
The Impact

We’re creating a series that  teaches
children the importance of their imagination, and how it can help them
creatively solve problems. Desdemona brings her dreams into the real world, and
we want the younger generations to realize that they can turn their dreams into
realities too.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't afford to contribute we're
happy you stopped
by to
look at our page and read our story. We only ask that you share our page
with as
many people as you can, use the Indiegogo share tools to make it easier,
post it
on social media, or even e-mail your friends. Every little bit brings this
dream one step closer to being brought into the real world, which could in turn
spark imaginations, and build the confidence of so many great dreamers-in-waiting
out there.
Thank you so much for your contributions to this project. Every
bit really helps!

address to us at info@desdemonasdreams.com

story:
It Began With A Hummingbird....

I am Isaac Xavier and the author of this book of inspiration. I am a health coach and creative writer. My writing comes from a place of heart-felt deep emotion for those who seek to enrich their feeling world. 

It is my wish that when a person reads my book that he or she is moved beyond words and transported to a place where the world stops....and YOU begin...

People who have read my book tell me that it is not just 'observational' poetry, that is, merely describing what is seen or felt. One person described my writing in the following way, "They open a door to take you to a better place." This is exactly my aim. Each piece has a higher meaning.

 Here is an poem from my book:

SCUBA*

Depression was
no longer

a problem

for me

once I realised

that I could

breathe at

the bottom

of that ocean.

 

* Self Contained Underwater Breathing Apparatus 

 

Why I would like your help...

I am raising funds to produce a book of inspiration that will take the reader on an extraordinary emotional journey. 

It will bring tears of joy, love and compassion...and it will bring you to the place where past and future no longer exist - the present.

This is a book of about the compelling journey through life and is the perfect gift for the ones who you love the most. 

My dream is for this book to become a beautiful memory, a gift kept forevermore. 

I won't compromise on quality because this book will be the respite from intellectual bombardment. It will be the place you come to...open a page at random...and transport yourself back into the feeling world...that place where the world stops, and you begin...

That place where you feel ALIVE again for the first time in a long time...

Here is another piece:

Honour Thyself

To respect

yourself is

to pay homage

to who you

are becoming. 

To respect others

is to do the same

for them.

 

Here is a breakdown of the production costs:

The printing quote is for A5 page size, matte full-colour cover, hard bound, no dust jacket, ribbons mark pages, and with a colour transparency of a watercolour hummingbird inserted. 

The funding for this book will go directly to the printing of a 180 page hardcover book with high quality paper.

Initial printed draft to present to publisher - $700

Design, layout, and prepress: $1800

Printing: $5205

(I will absorb the Paypal and Indiegogo fees (approx 5% each) into each book sale)

Total: $7705

 

Paying it forward... 

Another goal is to donate to the Hamlin Fistula Ethiopia with every sale of the book...I will donate $5AUD per book raising $2500 paying for 4 operations for women to get their lives and their dignity back. (This is based on selling the initial first print run of 500 copies)

I personally donate to this charity and would love to continue to support their wonderful work with more money and also create greater awareness of their amazing and life saving operations.

www.hamlin.org.au

What You Get

 

$15 - Yay, I Get This Right Now!

Your generous contribution will have you transported into the world of the Hummingbird within a few short minutes...for this investment you will receive 'It Began With a Hummingbird' Digital (eBook) delivered straight to your inbox.

 

$33 - One for Me or The 'Perfect' Gift

This generous donation will get you One Signed Hardcover Copy of 'It Began With a Hummingbird'...You will be one of the FIRST people to receive a copy...hot off the press! You will get to touch, smell, and indulge in each and every word...

 

$64 - One for Me & One for My Best Friend

This extra generous donation will get you TWO Signed Hardcover copies of 'It Began With a Hummingbird"...You and your friend (or loved one) will have the most wonderful conversations about your favourite poems and what they mean to you....how they made you feel. You will laugh together, cry together and become more connected than you were before.

 

$90 - One for Me & TWO for Those Who Need It Most

This incredibly generous donation will get you THREE Signed Hardcover copies of 'It Began With a Hummingbird"...Indulge in this experience yourself then wait until you feel the 'knowing'...the knowing that tells you...he/she needs a copy of this book. You know that feeling? You've had it before. Hold onto an extra copy or two and surprise someone who needs it most...be that person who lights up their world, if you so choose. OR gift them to two people you love. 

 

$115 - It's Really Time to Share...

This phenomenal donation will get you FOUR Signed Hardcover copies of 'It Began With a Hummingbird" AND the Digital Copy for you to take with you wherever you are...It's getting close to Christmas and you have no idea what to buy for your nearest and dearest...or perhaps you have a whole round of special birthdays coming up and everyone is at that age where they need for nothing. This is the perfect gift! OR, perhaps you just wish to gift...just because you can...and it feels so good to do it. Here's an idea...take this option, head to the nearest cancer treatment centre and gift them those having treatment. Or perhaps notice someone working in a job that pays little and reaps few rewards...yet they do it with joy. Perhaps you can make a new friend and gift it to them. The options are endless.. but every option will make you feel more awake, alive, joyous than you can remember. 

 

$333 - Now It's Getting Personal...In All The Right Ways...

This humbling donation will get you A POEM WRITTEN FOR YOU PERSONALLY (or another person you nominate)...A Signed Hardcover copy of 'It Began With a Hummingbird" AND the Digital Version to have with you always. To have a poet see you, truly see you, and write about you in language that flows like the ocean, is an enlightening, heartfelt, soulful experience that will elevate you to new levels of self acceptance and self love. New poems written for this project will be printed in the next book of poetic wisdom...so your generous donation will flow on forevermore. 

For this option, you will speak with Isaac directly so he can get a clear sense of your essence, your journey, your soul and bring together words of beauty about you or the one you love. 

 

Rest assured, If I am not to reach the goal of $7705, I will put all monies raised into the production and continue to fund the remainder from my own earnings. 

Your investment is guaranteed and you will most certainly received your purchase.

 

Other ways you can help

I do not have an advertising budget.

So, I am relying on social media and word of mouth to make this campaign and project known.

Please tell your friends to visit and share this campaign OR http://isaacxavier.com/the-shop/ on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Pinterest.

Thank you so much for your time and generous consideration.

 

What Others Have Said:

"Isaac Xavier is a unique poet.

On seeing Isaac you instantly know he is a very fit and healthy individual. The fact that he is Health Coach and Rehabilitation Specialist comes as no surprise.

On meeting, talking to, and then discovering  that he is such a moving poet, makes him an extraordinary individual.

Whether his body informs his mind, or his mind informs his body, the fact is Isaac's poetry is a rare combination of both."

- Ellen Komesarook , Athlete and Montessori Educator, USA 

 

"Isaac Xavier’s skill as a rehabilitation specialist is in fixing bodies and focussing minds. In his debut as a poet, we come to realise he is also very much about healing hearts.'It began with a Hummingbird' is a sensitive collection through the eyes of a soulful man."

- Martine Harte, Award winning television journalist
Digital publisher - engaging women.com.au

 

"Reading Isaac Xavier’s poetry is a mindfulness exercise in itself. When he “looks”, he truly “sees”, whether he’s pondering the joys of love (not a “fall” into love but “an ascent”), enjoying the  “crimson hairdo” of a rambutan or watching a torrential rainstorm pound the sea. He’s “in the moment”. And he takes you, the reader, there with him."

- Liz Porter, Award-winning Melbourne journalist, novelist and forensic science writer

 

“This book takes you on a beautiful and emotional journey”

Gaye Newton

story:
More about this fund-raising appeal

What it's about, above all, is helping get a vital piece of radical history back into the hands of those who made it.

The English-language edition of my book, "Bolivia's Radical Tradition," came out several years ago. It has always been my goal to produce a Spanish-language version for a key Bolivian, and more broadly Latin American, audience. Bolivia is one of the places where this kind of radical history, together with the ideas and hard-fought struggles it emerged from, are deeply meaningful to significant numbers of working-class, indigenous, campesino and student activists. Yet many of the key documents and other sources were scattered through the world in archives from Paris to Potosi, El Alto to Palo Alto. An accurate account and interpretation was, moreover, lacking until now. At least that's how it always seemed to me.

To do the Spanish edition and be able to bring it back to Bolivia required years of work. This involved reviewing the original sources, making additions to the text, and translating the  book myself (with crucial input from a colleague in Mexico). This was a "labor of love," and one I hoped to finish while the most important participants in this project -- the movement veterans I'd interviewed ---- were still alive. This has not been the case for more than a few of them, but others are still there in La Paz, El Alto, Cochabamba and elsewhere. I believe it is important to give them the book and talk with them about it while that's still possible.

I was asked to "present" (launch) the book (called "El trotskismo boliviano" in Spanish) at the International Book Fair in La Paz. For money and work reasons this could not be arranged (particularly not for an adjunct professor still waiting for the semester's first paycheck).

However, a book launch is being organized in La Paz very soon. My companion and I were able to use frequent flier miles to cover most of the airfare for us to get there in late September. The basic targets of the funds I need to raise are remaining travel expenses including visa, inoculation, travel, lodging, food and likely book-publicity expenses within Bolivia; a number of copies of the Spanish-language book for libraries and individuals; several copies of the English-language book (which, unlike the Spanish one, includes the collection of historic photos) for the same objective; as well as expenses for further related research.

story:
Have you ever wanted to improve your life? 

To be a better woman tomorrow than you are today?

Picture it:  Los Angeles, California, 1980-ish.  I sat quietly outside the kitchen and listened as my mother and other relatives ripped to shreds a book called Fascinating Womanhood.  After hearing about how much they hated the book, I could not wait to read it, thinking that the book would be full of racy details. 

I was disappointed, in a way, because the book was, perhaps, PG-rated.  However, the book changed my life as no other book had or would, with the exception of The Bible. 

Mrs. Andelin's book touched my heart and made me realize that I wanted my marriage to be different from those I had observed in my family and in my friend's families.  I realized that I wanted to become a more loving and feminine woman and to enjoy a happy, companionable relationship rather than a combative relationship.  I achieved my goals and wanted to share my experience with other women.

Fast forward to 2004, when I began teaching marriage enrichment classes using Mrs. Andelin's book as a textbook.  Hundreds of women have benefited from my classes, and from those classes, I originated my own teaching materials and presentations: a curriculum, if you will.  I now wish to publish my curriculum beyond my classes, and I invite you to help me to improve women's lives the world over.

What You Will Receive

Contributors from the United States will receive their choice of a personalized PDF version of the book or a softcover copy of the book inscribed to them and signed by me.

Contributors outside the United States will receive a personalized PDF version of the book.  Alas, due to shipping costs, the softcover copy of the book is not available as a perk to contributors beyond the borders of the United States.

After the book is published, I intend to donate ten percent of my profits to an organization that helps  parents.  You will enjoy the knowledge that you helped not only me but other women to improve their lives.

    Other Ways to Help

    Please tell your friends about my book.  Please share the links to my campaign and to other campaigns that you perceive are worthy of your attention.  If you have a Facebook or Twitter account or a blog, would you please mention my campaign because I want to help as many women as possible.  Thank you.

    Topics Covered in the Book

    The book consists of twenty-one lessons.  Here follow a few examples of topics covered in the book:

    • Learning about the three types of marriages and the keys to enjoying a happy marriage
    • Awakening love, tenderness, and devotion from loved ones
    • Joyfully embracing classical femininity and the four feminine roles
    • Learning self-acceptance and appropriate self-love
    • Releasing worry and bitterness
    • Giving up old resentments and hurts
    • Dealing with life's inevitable adversity
    • Enjoying marital intimacy

    Where Your Contributions Will Go

    The book is finished.  I want to have it professionally edited, and I would like to have a professional book cover designed for it.  I will design and format the interior myself and would like to purchase two pretty fonts to do so.

    Editing:  $350.00

    Cover Design:  $250.00

    Art for the Cover:  $100.00 (estimate)

    Copyright Registration Fees:  $35.00

    Fonts:  $35.00

    Any amount that is raised will help me to help other women by defraying at least in part the costs of publication.

    Essentially, my book is available for advanced ordering to fund production costs, costs that I cannot manage completely on my own.

    Thank you!  Have a fascinating day!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Renier Gertzen. Before we had children I was very involved as a dog trainer working with Rottweilers. Unfortunately our lives became too busy and we had to park dog training. These days we (my wife and I) employ the techniques and principles we used in dog training to make good citizens of our children.

Many people have asked us for advice in dealing with situations that they battle with. It started to dawn on us that we are doing something different. Everyone kept referring to that fact but we didn't quite knew what they meant. Then... One day we were battling with an issue with our eldest daughter and the wife turned to me and asked, how would I fix this in Qadesh (my Rottweiler bitch of 3 years)?  Then it dawned on me, we are doing something different, we are using the best tool we had... our knowledge of dog training. We sat down and discussed this at length and started to realize that since Isla was born, all the major obstacles we faced, we used dog training principles to overcome them. It was only recently that I decided that this is something worth sharing with other parents and promptly started to write this book.

We found that dog training principles work, because there are much less noise (tantrums, crying, yelling, screaming, arghhh....). With dogs, it is much easier to see the actual problem or behavior that needs to be corrected.

I have thought long and hard about how to approach this project and make this available to parent everywhere and eventually stumbled onto this website. Your support will make it possible to share this knowledge with parents, helping them to raise and... survive their toddler.

What We Need & What You Get

My primary goal is to reach at the very least a stage where the book is professionally edited and printed. Estimated cost for reaching this goal is $6500.

Below I am attaching a breakdown of how the funds will be applied, should that level of funding be reached:

At the moment, all contributors ($5 and above) will receive an e-book. Should this campaign reach level 4, the book will finally go to print. When this happens, more perks will be unlocked, which will give contributors the opportunity to convert their e-books to printed books or add additional printed books (in addition to the e-books).

All funds would be applied towards this project, even if the goal is not reached. $90 will probably not afford editing of any kind, but at least it would go towards obtaining the ISBN numbers.

The Impact

Many parents struggle with the same issues we had. This book will not detail how every problem a parent might face can be solved, but it will give a clear methodology in Part 1 of the book that will equip parents to deal with these problems. Part 2 of the book deals with things that a parent need to keep in mind when utilizing the techniques in Part 1. Lastly, some of the "tools" that makes coping with toddlers easeir are highlighted in Part 3. All this will enable a parent to influence situations to achieve the best possible outcome.

This is a book that every parent of a toddler out there should have.

Short Summary
My name is Renier Gertzen. Before we had children I was very involved as a dog trainer working with Rottweilers. Unfortunately our lives became too busy and we had to park dog training. These days we (my wife and I) employ the techniques and principles we used in dog training to make good citizens of our children.
Many people have asked us for advice in dealing with situations that they battle with. It started to dawn on us that we are doing something different. Everyone kept referring to that fact but we didn't quite knew what they meant. Then... One day we were battling with an issue with our eldest daughter and the wife turned to me and asked, how would I fix this in Qadesh (my Rottweiler bitch of 3 years)?  Then it dawned on me, we are doing something different, we are using the best tool we had... our knowledge of dog training. We sat down and discussed this at length and started to realize that since Isla was born, all the major obstacles we faced, we used dog training principles to overcome them. It was only recently that I decided that this is something worth sharing with other parents and promptly started to write this book.
We found that dog training principles work, because there are much less noise (tantrums, crying, yelling, screaming, arghhh....). With dogs, it is much easier to see the actual problem or behavior that needs to be corrected.
I have thought long and hard about how to approach this project and make this available to parent everywhere and eventually stumbled onto this website. Your support will make it possible to share this knowledge with parents, helping them to raise and... survive their toddler.

What We Need & What You Get
My primary goal is to reach at the very least a stage where the book is professionally edited and printed. Estimated cost for reaching this goal is $6500.
Below I am attaching a breakdown of how the funds will be applied, should that level of funding be reached:

At the moment, all contributors ($5 and above) will receive an e-book. Should this campaign reach level 4, the book will finally go to print. When this happens, more perks will be unlocked, which will give contributors the opportunity to convert their e-books to printed books or add additional printed books (in addition to the e-books).
All funds would be applied towards this project, even if the goal is not reached. $90 will probably not afford editing of any kind, but at least it would go towards obtaining the ISBN numbers.
